Ma chanich najun ju stavasalanti najun. Ma yuchi ju lai lhilaksican chai yuchi ju navikʼolh tachi chun ju taxtokni ju ixnajunta ju Dios ni caʼalilh.
66003015	Ju yuchi ma cʼatsai tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Pus ju uxijnan ma jantu ixlhichux ju miʼalhunutʼan ju lhilacʼapʼimpʼutʼunatʼit ju yuchi. Nin yuchi ni ma amacʼompʼutʼutʼit ju macxcai. Pus ma palai kʼox caʼixva ni lana ixlhilacʼapʼitʼit ixlhichux miʼalhunutʼan. U lana asamakʼantʼit.
66003016	Para ju uxijnan ni jantu ixlhichux miʼalhunutʼan ju lhilacʼapʼimpʼutʼunatʼit pus ju yuchi ma vachuʼ catasamakʼananch.
66003017	Pus ju uxijnan ma nonatʼit ni na makʼalinin untʼatʼit. Ma nonatʼit ni na lhu ju makʼaixtʼoktʼatʼit ju mimakʼalitʼan. Chai ma va nonatʼit ni jantu tuʼuʼ maktasqʼuiniyatʼit. Ma chunch ju nonatʼit para ma jantu machʼakxayatʼit ni Dios talaktsʼinan tachi ju lana na makʼalhkʼajnanatʼit chai painiʼitnich untʼatʼit chai quilhpatinin untʼatʼit chai alakʼachʼixnin untʼatʼit chai lana matich ju mimpumpuʼan.
66003018	Para ju yuchi ma taquilhtapujuyan ni atʼamonin ju yuchi ju oro ju lakʼoxicanta lacajipi. Ju chunch ma vasalh makʼalinin aʼunaʼitʼit. Chai ma atʼamonin ju xnapapa pumpuʼ ni laich alakchʼiyaʼitʼit. Chai ju chunch jantu amaxananaʼitʼit va ixlacaʼatalh ni va kʼai tsasau aʼunaʼitʼit. Chai ma atʼamonin ju cʼuchʼu ju laich amucʼayaʼitʼit lamilakchulhʼan ni laich vasalh alacʼavananaʼitʼit.
66003019	Pus ju yuchi acsni vasalh mapaini tam xamatiʼ pus ma kʼaji acsni jantu sok an chai mamakʼalhkʼajni. Pus ma yuchi talhijunan ni ixlhichux ju miʼalhunutʼan tamch apʼastʼactʼit ixlacata tuchʼi naviyatʼit.
66003020	Pus ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui ma ya lacamalhtich lhimakspaʼ chai xakʼalai ju tanun pulacni. Chai ni xamatiʼ cakʼasmatniyaʼ ju ixchivinti chai camalhtekʼanilh pus ju yuchi ma catanuyaʼ chai ma catʼavenach.
66003021	Pus va tichi chavaich ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma calakʼaʼicanaʼ ni catʼatolaʼ laʼixpuʼucxtin ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti tachi ju yuchi ni sastuclh ju macxcai chai tʼavi ju ixpai ju laʼixpuʼucxtin.
66003022	Pus ju alin ju ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti”.
66004001	Acsni quintʼachivinkʼolh ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui pus astan iclaktsʼilh ni ilhtekʼai lakatam malhtich ju lactʼiyan. Chai ickʼasmatnichokolh ixchivinti ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Chai ju iskʼasmatca ju anuʼ chivinti chunch ixjunita tachi ju istʼasat ju tuʼuʼ skʼolh. Chai chani quijuni: ―Asokʼoch ani chai acmasuniyan ju tuchi vasalh catapasayaʼ astan. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni.
66004002	Pus icʼalh chai ju Spiritu Santu tachapun xaquinavi ni lai xaclaktsʼin ju lactʼiyan ixputolan ju kʼai ucxtin. Chai anch ixvi ju Dios.
66004003	Chai ju yuchi chun slamnicʼa istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju jaspe juncan. Chai vachuʼ slapulh istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju sardis juncan. Vachuʼ ixtalakachoko ju putolan istasui lakatam quilhmacchat. Chai ju yuchi stakʼau istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju esmeralda juncan.
66004004	Chai ixtalakachoko ju anuʼ xakʼai putolan ixʼalin alakapʼuxamtʼatʼi putolan. Chai ixtapuvilanalh pumapʼuxamtʼatʼi lackʼajin papaninch. Sich ixtalakchʼita ju na xnapapa ixpumpuʼan. Chai ixtalacpatanumanalh ixcoronaʼan ju si oro ixjunita.
66004005	Chai ju lacakʼai putolan ixtaxtui ju makʼalipniʼ. Vachuʼ ixtaxtui ixchivintiʼan ju anuʼ ju ixtachivinin. Chai na pʼas istʼasai ju tʼajin. Chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan ixmaktajita lakatujun maclhcu. Yuchach ju ixpupastaccan ju Spiritu Santu.
66004006	Chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ kʼai putolan ixma ju tuʼuʼ tachi lakatam kʼai atantsʼin. Para na kʼox stalankʼa ixjunita. Chai laʼixtalakachoko ju anuʼ kʼai putolan ixʼalin lakatʼatʼi atapacxat. Pumatam laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ. Pumatam laʼixpulacan. Pumatam laʼixlhicana. Chai pumatam laʼixlhimacx. Chai ju anuʼ lakatʼatʼi atapacxat si lana lakchulh ixtajunita laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan chai laʼixpulacanʼan.
66004007	Pus ju xapʼulhnan atapacxat chunch istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ león. Chai ju ixlhilakatʼui atapacxat chunch istasui tachi ju satsʼalh vacax. Ju ixlhilakatʼutu atapacxat ixpacxanta ixʼucxpuʼ tachi ixʼucxpuʼ lapanac. Chai ju ixlhilakatʼatʼi atapacxat chunch istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼatsʼokʼo ju alhtʼilitnin.
66004008	Chai ju pumatamin ju anuʼ lakatʼatʼi atapacxat ixpacxanta lakachaxan ixpakʼachuʼan. Chai laʼixkʼelhtankʼajpuʼ ju ixpakʼachuʼan chai laʼixʼucxni va si lakchulh ixjunita. Chai tontacuj chai tontatsʼis va tachi ixtamilhpai. Lana jantu tavanan ju jantu tamilhpa. Ixtanajun: Salaka. Salaka. Salaka ju kʼai ucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Yuchi ju ixtʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai yuchi ju catsucukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch.
66004009	Pus ju anuʼ atapacxat ixtalakʼayai chai ixtajunich lakʼailaktsʼiuch ju Dios ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan. Yuchach ju tʼonkʼalhi.
66004010	Pus va ta pakchux ju chunch ixtalai ju anuʼ atapacxat pus ju pumapʼuxamtʼatʼi papanin ixtataʼaktsokotaich laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan. Yuchi ju jonkʼalhita. Chai ixtalakʼayai. Chai ixtalakamamai ixcoronaʼan laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios chai ixtamilhpani. Chani ixtajuni:
66004011	Ji quiʼucxtin chai quiDios aktsʼiya lhijunch ni alakʼayacʼanaʼ chai ni atʼalhonicʼanaʼ. Chai ni alinch ju mintachaput pus lhijunch ni chunch ju aʼulhtʼucʼanaʼ ni uxintʼi ju navikʼotʼa tachi chun ju taxtokni chai laminkʼachat ju alinkʼo.
66005001	Chai iclaktsʼilh ju anuʼ ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan ni ixchʼapata laʼixlhicana lakatam alhiqui ju ispasmilhcanta. Chai ju anuʼ alhiqui istsʼokcanta laʼixpulacni chai laʼixmacan. Chai lacatujun ixlakalamcanta.
66005002	Chai iclaktsʼilh pumatam anquilh ju na tachapun ixjunita. Chai ju yuchi na pʼas ixtʼajun chiviniʼ ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chani ixtʼajun nonaʼ: ―Tis chavaich ju lhijunch ni laich camalamaconi junta lam lakxtokcanta junima alhiqui chai laich capuxkʼotlh.
66005003	Para jantu lai xamatiʼ ixpuxkʼotʼa ju anuʼ alhiqui. Nin anch ju lactʼiyan nin anch ju lacatʼun nin anch laxtankʼajni ju lacatʼun. Nin caʼalilh xamatiʼ ju lai catʼachivinilh.
66005004	Chai ju quitʼin slivasalh xackʼalhun ni jantu ixlhitajucanta xamatiʼ ju ixlhijun ni laich capuxkʼotli ju anuʼ alhiqui nin yuchi ni lai catʼachivinilh.
66005005	Pus ju acsnich pumatam sia yuʼunch ju papanin ju ixtavilanancha anch chani quijuni: ―Jantu akʼalh. Ju Jesús sastuclich ju macxcai. Chai ju yuchi xaleón junita sia yuʼunch ju makʼaniya ixtamaskʼatʼanti ju Judá chai ju kʼai ucxtin David. Chai ni sastuclich ju macxcai ju yuchi pus laich calamamaconiyaʼ junta lacatujun lakalamcanta chai lai capuxkʼotʼaʼ ju alhiqui.
66005006	Chai iclaktsʼilh lakatam Askʼatʼa Borrego. Anch ixya laʼixlacaitat junta ixvi ju kʼai putolan chai junta ixtayanancha ju lakatʼatʼi atapacxat chai junta ixtavilanancha ju papaninch. Chai ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego chunch istasui tachi ju va ixmaknicanta. Chai ju yuchi ixʼalin lakatujun ixʼakalokot chai lakatujun ixlakchulh. Pus ju anuʼ lakchulh yuchi ju Spiritu Santu ju malakachai ju Dios ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66005007	Pus ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego alh. Chai amaklhtayanalh ju alhiqui ju ixchʼapata laʼixlhicana ju anuch ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan.
66005008	Chai acsni amaklhtayanalh ju alhiqui ju Askʼatʼa Borrego pus ju anuʼ ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat chai ixpumapʼuxamtʼatʼiʼan papanin tataʼaktsokotanilh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ Borrego. Chai pumatamin ju yuʼunch ixtachʼapata ixlhisanʼan ju arpa juncan chai ixpumapʼunʼan ju si oro ixjunita. Chai anchach ju ixtaxavai ixpumʼan. Chai ju pum yuchach ixchivintiʼan ju ixlapanacni Dios ju ani lacamunutpaʼ ju tuchi tapuxakʼalai ju Dios.
66005009	Chai ju anuʼ atapacxat chai ju papaninch tamilhpa lakatam sastʼi milhpat. Chani ixtanajun: Lhijunch ni uxintʼi ju achʼapʼa ju alhiqui chai alamamacʼonitʼi junta lakalamcanta. Lhijunch ni chunch ju alatʼi ni ixmaknicʼantʼa ju uxintʼi. Chai laminʼacʼalhni alhimalakxtʼutʼa ju lapanacni ju talhilaksich ju Dios. Amalakxtʼutʼa sia yuʼunch ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti chai sia yuʼunch ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66005010	Chai ju uxintʼi aʼulatʼa kʼai ucxtinin. Chai vachuʼ aʼulatʼa ju palijni ni catalakʼayayach ju quiDiosʼan. Chai ju yuʼunch catalhinonaʼ ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66005011	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lhu lana ju anquilhnin. Jantu lai ixputekʼekʼocan ni lana na lhu istasui. Pus ju yuʼunch anch ixtayanancha laʼixlacaitat junta ixvi ju kʼai putolan chai junta ixtayanancha ju atapacxat chai ju papanin. Chai ickʼasmatlh ni ixtachivinin ju anquilhnin.
66005012	Pʼas ixtachivinin ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai chani ixtanajun: Ixmaknicanta ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Chai lhijunch ni calakʼayacalh. Catanonach ni yuchi ju alin ixmakʼalit chai na kʼox ixtacʼatsan chai na alin ixtachaput. Pus yuchi lhijunch ni calakʼayacalh chai catalhonicalh.
66005013	Chai ickʼasmatlh ni ixtachivinin tachi chun ju taxtokni ju navita ju Dios ju tatʼajun ju lactʼiyan chai ju lacatʼun chai ju laxtankʼajni ju lacatʼun chai ju lacaʼalama. Ixchuxʼan chani ixtanajun: Ju vi lacakʼai putolan chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego yuʼunchach ju tucan xalackʼajin. Chach atalhonikʼalhicalh. Chai chach alakʼayakʼalhicalh. Chach noncalh ni na alin ixtachaputʼan. Chunch ju tanaulh.
66005014	Chai ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat ixtanajun ni chunch vasalh caʼanavicalh. Chai ju papanin lana tataʼaktsokotanilh. Chai talakʼaya.
66006001	Pus iclaktsʼilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconi junta ixlamcanta lacatam. Chai ickʼasmatlh ixchivinti pumatam sia yuʼunch ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat. Chai acsni chivinilh na pʼas istʼasai tachi acsnich tʼasai ju tʼajin. Chani ju quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani.
66006002	Pus icʼalh. Chai iclaktsʼilh lakatam caballo ju na xnapapa ixjunita. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixchʼapata ixʼakxmuti chai ixtaknicanta lakatam ixcorona. Pus taxtulh. Chai junta alh lasanaʼ jantu tavanan istsʼankʼai.
66006003	Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconilh ju ixlhilacatʼui junta ixlamcanta pus ickʼasmatlh ju ixchivinti ju ixlhipumatʼui atapacxat. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani.
66006004	Chai icʼalh. Chai lana taxtuchokolh alakatam caballo ju na slapulh ixjunita. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixtaknicanta ixpokʼai ni laich camalasani ju lapanacni ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Ju chunch ju lapanacni catalamakniyach. Chai ju anuʼ ju ixpujucʼalh ju caballo xtaknicalh lakatam kʼai espada.
66006005	Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconi ju ixlhilacatʼutu junta ixlamcanta pus ickʼasmatlh ixchivinti ju ixlhipumatʼutu atapacxat. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani. Pus icʼalh. Chai iclaktsʼilh alakatam caballo ju na tsʼiti ixjunita. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixchʼapata lakatam pamakchʼixni laʼixmacaʼ.
66006006	Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti tachi ju va anch ixminacha junta ixtayananchalh ju pumatʼatʼi atapacxat. Chai chani ixnajun: ―Ju tam kilo ju trigo lhistʼacan tachi ju lhajacan tamin avilhchan lacalhichʼalhcat. Chai lakatʼutu kilo ju cebada lhistʼacan tachi ju lhajacan tam avilhchan lacalhichʼalhcat. Para jantu catilhitapalalh ju aceite nin yuchi ju vino. ―Chunch ju naulh ju xachivinin.
66006007	Pus ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconi ju ixlhilacatʼatʼi junta lamcanta pus ickʼasmatlh ixchivinti ju ixlhipumatʼatʼi atapacxat. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani.
66006008	Pus icʼalh. Chai iclaktsʼilh alakatam caballo ju na istakta. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixjuncan aninti. Chai ju alasaninin tachʼakʼokʼalh. Chai xtaknicalh ju lapanac ixpokʼai ni laich calhinaulh ixmaknica tam cuarto tachi chun ju lapanacni ju ixtatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Laich caʼamakni lacamachita chai lacachavanti chai lacatakʼankʼat chai caʼamamakninin ju maktilin ju alin ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66006009	Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconilh ju ixlhilacaquis junta ixlamcanta pus icʼalacʼavanalh laʼixtankʼapuʼ junta ixavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai ju anch iclaktsʼilh ju ixtacuvinʼan ju lapanacni ju ixʼamaknicanta va ixlacaʼatalh ni ixtalacaʼita ixchivinti Dios chai ni ixtajuni ju anuʼ chivinti ju ixtʼalapanacni.
66006010	Chai ju yuʼunch na pʼas tachivinilh acsni chani tanaulh: ―Ji quiʼucxtin ju uxintʼi na salakaʼat. Chai aktsʼiya muctʼaxtʼui ju minchivinti. Pus tus tavananch ju alaktsʼintʼanuyaʼ ju quilhamakʼan quincʼan chai amamalakchʼavaniyaʼich ixlacata ju quinʼacʼalhni quincʼan ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju lacamunutpaʼ. ―Chunch tanaulh ju anuʼ tacuvin.
66006011	Pus ju acsnich axtaknicalh ju yuʼunch xnapapa ixpumpuʼan ju pumatamin. Chai ajunicalh ni catapacxalhcaʼ atilacatsʼunin tus acsni catataʼaktsayach ixtʼaxalapanacni chai ixlhiʼalakʼavinʼan ju vachuʼ chunch catapuniyaʼ tachi ju yuʼunch.
66006012	Chai iclaktsʼilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconilh ixlhilacachaxan junta ixlamcanta chai lana na pʼas tataclh ju lacatʼun. Chai ju avilhchan lana na smalaka va tachi ju tuʼuʼ tsʼiti pumpuʼ. Chai ju malhquiyuʼ lana na lapulh va tachi ju acʼalhni.
66006013	Chai ju stʼacu tapataju. Tamachilh ju lacatʼun tachi ju tuʼuʼ xalhiʼut qʼuiu ni jopʼon patajui ni sunui ju un.
66006014	Chai ju lactʼiyan lana matich va tachi acsni pasmilhcan ju tuʼuʼ alhiqui. Chai tachi chun ju talhpa chai tachi chun ju lactʼicstʼi lacatʼun lacaʼalama si amakʼosukʼocalh.
66006015	Pus ju acsnich ju xaʼucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ chai ju xalackʼajinch chai ju xaʼucxtinin taropajni chai ju makʼalinin chai ju lactachapunin chai tachi chun ju lapanacni mas xalapanacni ixtajunita chai vachuʼ ju yuʼunch ju matiʼ ixjunita ixʼucxtinʼan sich lana tatankʼanukʼo junta pulhucucu talhpa ixjunita chai junta lacvi ju chiux ju lacaqʼuivin.
66006016	Chai chani ixtajuni ju anuʼ lactalhpa chai ju anuʼ chiux: ―Apʼatʼaʼutʼitch. Aquilatantʼalhmauch. Chach jantu aquintalaktsʼin ju yuchi ju vi lacakʼai putolan. Chai chach jantu aclaktsʼiu ixtalhkʼamti ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
66006017	Chunch aquilaʼulhtuch ni chilh ju avilhchan acsni aquintamamakʼalhkʼajniyan ju Dios. Chai tis chavaich ju lai casastʼucʼaʼ ju yuchi.
66007001	Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh pumatʼatʼi anquilhnin. Chai ju yuʼunch ixtayanalh laʼixmakastutʼatʼi ju lacamunutpaʼ chai istasastʼucʼach ju un ju ixajachilh ju makastutʼatʼi ju lacamunutpaʼ. Ju chunch jantu catilalh ju un ju ani lacatʼun nin anch ju lacaʼalama nin yuchi ni lai casunulh ju qʼuiu.
66007002	Chai iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ju ixminacha junta xajachilh ju avilhchan. Chai ju yuchi ixchʼapata ixpamichin ju Dios ju lakʼajunta. Chai lana na pʼas axakʼala ju anuʼ ixpumatʼatʼiʼan anquilhnin ju ixʼaxtaknicanta ju ixpokʼaiʼan ni laich catalakʼalhiyaʼ ju lacatʼun chai ju alama.
66007003	Chai ju anuʼ anquilh ajuni: ―Tucaʼ alakʼalhitʼit ju lacatʼun nin yuchi ju alama nin yuchi ju qʼuiu. Chach ictimichikʼoyau ju ixlapanacni Dios laʼismuntsanʼan.
66007004	Chai ickʼasmatlh ta pumachux ju ixʼamichican. Chaʼalh tam cientos a cuarenta y cuatro milh lapanacni. Asacxtucalh sia yuʼunch ixʼapapanatnich ju pumacautʼuiʼan istsʼalan ju Israel.
66007005	Lakacautʼui milh amichicalh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Judá. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Rubén. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Gad.
66007006	Chai lakacautʼui milh amichicalh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Aser. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Neftalí. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Manasés.
66007007	Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Simeón. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Leví. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Isacar.
66007008	Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Zabulón. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju José. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Benjamín.
66007009	Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh aliʼin lhu lapanacni. Jantu lai xamatiʼ ixʼaputʼekʼekʼojui. Ixtataxtutacha ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ junta ixtachʼanxtaminin chai ixtachivinin tijpachux chivinti. Chai ju anuch lapanacni ixtayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego. Chai ixtalakchʼita xnapapa ju ixpumpuʼan chai ixtachʼapata ixʼaxtacnaʼan.
66007010	Chai na pʼas ixtachivinin ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chani ixtanajun: Ju quiDiosʼan vi lacakʼai putolan. Pus ju yuchi chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego yuʼunch ju taʼamakʼalhtaxtunun.
66007011	Chai chux ju anquilhnin ixtayanankʼo ixtalakachoko junta ixvi ju Dios lacakʼai putolan chai junta ixtayanalh ju papanin chai ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat. Chai ju anuʼ anquilhnin tataquilhputalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios junta ixvi lacakʼai putolan chai talakʼayalh ju yuchi.
66007012	Tanaulh: Vasalh chanich canavicalh ju quiDiosʼan. Chach xtaknikʼalhicalh lakʼailaktsʼiuch. Chai chach lakʼayakʼalhicalh ni yuʼunch ju tacʼatsakʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Chach talhonikʼalhicalh yuchi ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Vasalh chach navikʼalhicalh chunch.
66007013	Pus ju acsnich pumatam sia yuʼunch ju papaninch quixakʼala. Quisacmi: ―Tis chavaʼitnich ju ani tayanalh ju talakchʼita sasnapapa ixpumpuʼan. Tas anchach ju tamintacha.
66007014	Chai ju quitʼin icjuni: ―Uxintʼich ju cʼatsʼai. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Pus yuʼunch ju ani ju tamintacha lacakʼai makʼalhkʼajnat chai tamakpatach ju ixpumpuʼan chai lhixnapapantach laʼixʼacʼalhni ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
66007015	Yuchi talhiyanalh ju laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan junta vi ju Dios. Chai tachʼalhcatnanich tontacuj chai tontatsʼis junta lakʼayacan ju yuchi. Chai ju Dios ju vi lacakʼai putolan yuchi ju vanin caʼalactʼatolaʼ ju tayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ni caʼalhistʼacʼach.
66007016	Jantu tavanan catitachavanilh nin yuchi ni lai cataquicxixli. Jantu catitalhini ju ixmacxcat ju avilhchan nin yuchi ni cataʼucsacʼatsa ju ixmacxcat.
66007017	Jantu chun catitapasalh ni isʼakstu ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ju calhistʼacʼaʼ. Yuchach ju ya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan. Chai yuchi ju caʼapʼulhniyach. Chai caʼalhiʼanach junta lhu ma ju xcan ju jantu lai xixa. Chai ju Dios yuchi ju camakʼosuyaʼ ju amakʼanita chai jantu xamatiʼ cakʼalhununaʼ.
66008001	Acsni malamaconilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ju ixlhilacatujun junta lamcanta pus lana sek tajunkʼo tachi chun ju ixtavilanalh ju lactʼiyan. Tachi paitat hora sek tajunlh.
66008002	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju anuʼ ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios chai axtaknicalh lakatamin iskʼolhʼan.
66008003	Chai milh apumatam anquilh chai taya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Pus anch laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan ixjunita. Chai ju anuʼ anquilh ixchʼapata lakatam pumapʼun si oro. Chai na lhu xaxtaknican ju pum ni laich caxavayaʼ junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai acsni ixtatʼajun tʼachivinin ju Dios tachi chun ju ixlapanacni acsnich ju lhu ixavai ju ixpum.
66008004	Pus ju xajin ju pum ju ixtʼajun tʼacutnuʼ lacapumapʼun ju ixchʼapata ju anuʼ anquilh alh junta ixvi ju Dios. Va lhiyaulh ixchivintiʼan ju ixlapanacni Dios acsni ixtatʼachivinin.
66008005	Pus ju acsnich ju anquilh lhiʼanchokolh ixpumapʼun junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum chai mujulh ju jipi. Astan ju yuchi xtʼekʼemacamilh ju jipi ju lacatʼun. Chai lana tʼasalh ju tʼajin. Chai na pʼas lacchivinincalh. Chai makʼalipnilh. Chai tataclh ju lacatʼun.
66008006	Pus ju acsnich ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata lakatamin iskʼolhʼan lana talalhcayaulh ni va ixtaʼasanamputunch.
66008007	Pus ju xapʼulhnan anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai lana tamachilh ju lacatʼun ju chajʼit chai ju jipi. Va lhiyalhch acʼalhni. Pus lana lhculh ju lacamunutpaʼ. Para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju lhculh. Chai anch junta lhculh pus lhcukʼo chux ju qʼuiu chai chux ju achʼitin ju stakʼau ixjunita.
66008008	Chai ju ixlhipumatʼui anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai ju tuʼuʼ tachi ju kʼai talhpa maktaitavi chai macaʼancalh lacaʼalama. Chai na lhu ju xaxcan alama ju lapa acʼalhni. Para nin ixpaitat ju alama jantu xachaʼan ju acʼalhni.
66008009	Chai anch junta lapa acʼalhni pus tanikʼo tachi chun ju atapacxat ju ixtatʼajun ju anch. Chai lana takʼalhikʼo ju barco ju ixtaʼanta ju anch.
66008010	Chai ju ixlhipumatʼutu anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai mincha lactʼiyan lakatam kʼai stʼacu. Na kʼai ixmactaiminta tachi tuʼuʼ maclhcu. Chai tajuchilh junta acxtui ju kʼai xcan chai ju xkʼati. Para jantu tajulh nin ixpaitat ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ junta acxtui ju kʼai xcan chai ju xkʼati.
66008011	Pus ju anuʼ kʼai stʼacu Ajenjo juncan. Chai ju kʼai xcan ju alin ju lacatʼun lana na sunch va tachi ju achʼitin ju ajenjo juncan. Para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju kʼai xcan ju alin ju ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ju na sun va. Chai na lhu lapanacni talhini ju xcan ni lana na sun va.
66008012	Chai ju ixlhipumatʼatʼi anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai lana takʼalhilh lacatsʼunin ju avilhchan para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju takʼalhi. Chai vana va chunch tapasalh lacamalhquiyuʼ. Takʼalhilh lacatsʼunin para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju takʼalhi. Chai vana va chun tapasalh ju stʼacu. Takʼalhi lacatsʼunin para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju takʼalhi. Pus ju chunch pus lana jantu isʼaktsai tachi ju aktsʼiya ixtamapulhcui. Pus ju tamin avilhchan lakatʼatʼi hora na istsʼista. Chai vana va chun ju tsʼis. Lakatʼatʼi hora jantu lai istasui nin yuchi ju stʼacu.
66008013	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lakatam kʼatsʼokʼo ju ixʼalhtʼilitnitʼajun laʼixlacaitat lactʼiyan. Chai ickʼasmatlh acsni na pʼas istʼasaʼanta. Ixnajun: ―Painiʼitnich. Painiʼitnich. Painiʼitnich catajunaʼ ju tatʼajun ju lacamunutpaʼ acsni cataskʼolach ju ixpumatʼutuʼan anquilhnin ju titacʼacx.
66009001	Pus ju ixlhipumaquis anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai iclaktsʼilh ni patajulh lakatam stʼacu. Tamacha ju lacatʼun. Chai xtaknicalh ju anuʼ stʼacu ju xallave junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Lana jantu lai cʼatsacan tas tus anch ju chaʼan.
66009002	Pus ju yuchi malhtekʼa junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Chai lana na lhu xajchilh ju jin. Chunch tachi ju tuʼuʼ jin ju taxtui lacahorno. Pus lana lakapuchʼapakʼo ju avilhchan. Chai tachi ju va paitat tsʼis va va ixlacaʼatalh ju xajin ju taxtulh junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta.
66009003	Chai lacajin taxtulh ju silek. Chai taʼakpitsilh ju lacatʼun. Chai axtaknicalh ju yuʼunch ixtachaputʼan tachi ixtachaput ju tuʼuʼ statsucu ju alin ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66009004	Chai ajunicalh ni ma jantu catalakʼalhi ju atsʼin ju alin ju lacamunutpaʼ nin ju tuʼuʼ ju stakʼau cava nin tuʼuʼ qʼuiu. Ma va yuʼunch ju lai catamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni ju jantu amichita ju Dios laʼismuntsanʼan.
66009005	Chai ajunicalh ni ma laich cataʼamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni lakaquis malhquiyuʼ. Para ma jantu lai catiʼamakni. Pus ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan chunch ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ statsucu acsni atsʼacʼanan.
66009006	Chai ju acsni avilhchan ju lapanacni na cataniputunach para jantu lai catitani.
66009007	Pus ju anuʼ silek ixtʼachunch ixtatasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ caballo ju mucʼanicanta ju tsasnat pumpuʼ acsni an lacalhilucut. Chai laʼisʼaktsulhʼan ixmucʼacanta ju tuʼuʼ tachi ixcoronaʼan ju si oro. Chai ju ixʼucxpuʼan tachi ixʼucxpuʼ lapanac ixtajunita.
66009008	Chai ixʼaiʼan chun ixjunita tachi ixʼai tam chakoʼulh. Chai istatsalatʼan chun ixtajunita tachi istatsalat ju tuʼuʼ león.
66009009	Chai laʼixtanquilhakni ixjucʼanilh ju tuʼuʼ tachi tsasnat. Chai ju ixpakʼachu ixmacatʼajun tachi istʼasat lhu carro ju taxakʼamai ju caballo acsni taʼan lacalhilucut.
66009010	Chai ixʼalin isʼistaʼan tachi isʼista ju statsucu chai ixʼalin ixpatsʼacʼanʼan. Chai laʼisʼistaʼan anchach ju ixʼalin ju ixtachaputʼan ni lai cataʼamamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju lapanacni. Para ajunicalh ni va lakaquis malhquiyuʼ lai cataʼamamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju lapanacni.
66009011	Chai alin ixʼucxtinʼan ju anuʼ silek. Yuchi ju xaʼanquilh junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Junta jantu lai cʼatsacan tas tus anch ju chaʼan. Ju ixtapakaʼut ju anuʼ anquilh lacalhihebreo Abadón juncan. Chai lacalhigriego ma Apolión juncan. Ju chunch va nomputun ni amakniniʼ junita.
66009012	Pus tapasalh ju xapʼulhnan makʼalhkʼajnat. Chai timinta alakatʼui makʼalhkʼajnat.
66009013	Pus ju acsnich ju ixlhipumachaxan anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju taxtucha ju laxmakʼastunuxni mixa ju tsupilin makʼastuya. Yuchach ju mixa junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai ju anuʼ tachi mixa ixjunita oro ixlhimanicanta chai ixvi laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios.
66009014	Pus ju anuʼ ju ixchivinin xakʼalalh ixlhipumachaxan anquilh ju ixchʼapata ju iskʼolh. Junich: ―Axkʼotʼich ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan anquilhnin ju alacchʼiyocanta laʼixquilhtuʼ kʼai xcan ju Eufrates juncan.
66009015	Pus lana axkʼotlh ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan anquilhnin. Pus yuʼunch ju ixʼalaclhcaʼulacanta ixlacata ju anuʼ pantsʼiquis chai ju anuʼ avilhchan chai ju anuʼ malhquiyuʼ chai ju anuʼ cʼata ni laich catamakni lhu lana ju lapanacni. Para jantu ixchaʼanta nin paitat tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ju camaknicanaʼ.
66009016	Pus ju anuʼ anquilhnin tapʼulhnilh ju taropajni ju ixtapuʼanta ixcaballoʼan. Chai ju anuʼ taropajni ixtachaʼanta lakatʼui cientos millón. Pus ickʼasmatlh ni chunch aputekʼecalh.
66009017	Pus chani istasui ju caballojni ju iclaktsʼilh tachi ju va laquinʼaklakʼavanti. Pus ju ixtajucʼanalh lacacaballo ixtalactanquilhakvilanalh ju tsasnat ju slapulh ixjunita. Chai azul chai xkavau ixjunita. Chai ju isʼaktsulhʼan ju caballojni chunch istasui tachi isʼaktsulh león. Chai laʼixquilhniʼan ixtapuquilhtaxtui ju jipi chai jin chai azufre.
66009018	Chai ju ani lakatʼutu makʼalhkʼajnat tapunilh lhu ju lapanacni. Para jantu chaʼalh nin paitat tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Yuchi ju amaknilh ju jipi chai ju jin chai ju azufre ju ixtaquilhtaxtui ju caballojni.
66009019	Pus alin ixtachaputʼan ju caballojni laʼixquilhniʼan chai laʼisʼistaʼan. Pus ju isʼistaʼan chunch ixtajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ lu ju alin isʼaktsulh chai yuchi ju taputacʼatsani ju lapanacni.
66009020	Pus ju aliʼin lapanacni ju jantu xatalhini ju ani makʼalhkʼajnat jantu tavanan tam ixtapastʼacʼa ixlacata tuchi ixtanavi. Va tachi ixtalhilacaʼan ju macxcai un chai ju santo ju lhinavicanta oro chai plata chai ju atumpa tsasnat chai ju va chiux chai ju va qʼuiu. Chunch ixtalai mas jantu lai taʼalacʼavanan ju isantoʼan nin lai catakʼasmatnalh nin yuchi ni lai cataʼalhtanalh.
66009021	Chai jantu tavanan tam xatapastʼacʼa ixlacata ju ixʼamaknintiʼan nin yuchi ni ixʼalhicujnutʼan nin yuchi ni va ixtatʼatʼajun va tichi chavaich nin yuchi ni ixtaʼakʼalhonan.
66010001	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ju na tachapun ixjunita. Chai ju yuchi mincha lactʼiyan. Va milh lacaʼataputsʼi. Chai lakatam quilhmacchat ixlacpajucalh. Chai ju ixʼucxpuʼ chunch istasui tachi ju avilhchan. Chai ju ixchʼajaʼ chunch ixtajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ makʼakʼai tantun ju na maktajita.
66010002	Chai ixchʼapata lakatam lacatʼicstʼi alhiqui ju ixtapuxkʼota. Chai laʼixlhichʼancana putachʼanju lacaʼalama. Chai laʼixlhichʼanmacx putachʼantalh lacatʼun.
66010003	Chai lana kʼox pʼas ju chivinilh tachi acsni na pʼas tʼasai ju tuʼuʼ kʼai león. Chunchach ju chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Chai acsni tʼasalh ju anuʼ anquilh pus paktujun tʼasalh ju tʼajin.
66010004	Chai acsni istʼasakʼolhch paktujun ju tʼajin pus ju quitʼin xactsʼokʼulaputun tuchi naulh. Para ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju mincha lactʼiyan ju chani xaquijuni: ―Jantu atsʼokʼulatʼi. Va amakʼatʼich lamiʼalhunut ju tuchi xanajun ju tʼajin acsni xatʼasai paktujun.
66010005	Chai ju anuʼ anquilh ju iclaktsʼilh ni ixya lacaʼalama chai lacatʼun macʼalh ju lactʼiyan laʼixlhicana.
66010006	Chai lhipastacli ju Dios ixpumavasalaca ixchivinti. Lhipastaclh ju Dios ju tʼonkʼalhi. Yuchi ju navilh ju tʼiyan chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju alin ju anch. Chai yuchi ju navilh ju lacatʼun chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju alin ju ani. Chai yuchi ju navilh ju lacatʼun chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju alin ju anch. Pus lhipastacli ju Dios chai naulh ni jantuch aliʼ tuʼuʼ cʼacx. Va yuchi ni caʼuctaxtukʼoyach tachi chun ju ispastacta ju Dios.
66010007	Para acsni cachinaʼ ju avilhchan acsni casunaʼ ju iskʼolh ju ixlhipumatujun anquilh acsnich ju cacʼatsacanaʼ ju tuchi ixʼajuni ju Dios ju ixlapanacni para jantu tavanan lai tamachakxa.
66010008	Pus ju acsnich ju anuʼ chivinti ju ickʼasmatlh ju minchalh lactʼiyan aktam quixakʼalachokopa. Quijuni: ―Inchich iniʼ ju alhiqui ju tapuxkʼota laʼixmacaʼ ju anuʼ anquilh ju chʼanjui ixtachʼantam lacaʼalama chai ju ixtachʼantam lacatʼunch.
66010009	Pus iclakʼalh ju anquilh chai icjunilh ni aquixtaknilh ju lacatʼicstʼi alhiqui. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Nich. Aʼutʼich. Na sun cajunaʼ lamimpajan para ju laminquilhni slivasalh na saksi cajunaʼ tachi ju tuʼuʼ tʼaxcat.
66010010	Pus ju quitʼin icʼamaklhtayanalh ju lacatʼicstʼi alhiqui laʼixmacaʼ ju anquilh chai lana icʼulh. Chai vasalh na saksi iclhiula laquinquilhni. Lana chun tachi ju tuʼuʼ tʼaxcat. Para acsni icʼokʼolh pus na sunch va laquimpajan.
66010011	Chai icjunicalh: ―Aktsʼiya tasqʼuini ni aʼunchʼokʼoyaʼich ju lapanacni tuchi catapasayaʼ. Aʼunch ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti chai ju kʼai ucxtinin.
66011001	Pus acsnich icxtaknicalh kʼantam actiyac ju pulhcacan tuʼuʼ. Chai icjunicalh: ―Akʼostʼaʼulh chai alhcʼatʼich ju ixpujitat Dios chai junta xavanican ju pum ju Dios. Vachuʼ apʼutʼekʼe ju anch taʼan lakʼayanin ju Dios.
66011002	Para jantu alhcʼayapʼi ju laʼismakspaʼ ju pujitat. Ju anch axtaknican ju yuʼunch ju jantu talakʼayai ju Dios. Chai lakatʼutu cʼata a paitat catalhinonaʼ ju yuʼunch ju lakʼachakʼan junta lakʼayacan ju Dios.
66011003	Chai acʼaxtakniyaʼ ixtachaputʼan ixtʼiyunʼan quilapanacni. Ju chunch laich catanonaʼ ju quinchivinti tam milh a lakatʼui cientos a sesenta avilhchan. Chai catalakchʼiyaʼ ju pumpuʼ tachi ju talakchʼi ju na taʼamakʼaninin.
66011004	Yuʼunch ju tachi akʼatʼui xaqʼuiu olivo tajunita. Chai tachi ju lakatʼui ixputayan cantila ju ya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios ju amanavin ju lacamunutpaʼ junita.
66011005	Chai ni xamatiʼ calactuʼuputunaʼ pus lana taxtui ju alapnaʼ laʼixquilhniʼan ju ixtʼiyunʼan lapanacni. Chai lana amakni ju ixtʼalaxcaiʼan. Pus ni xamatiʼ calactuʼuputunaʼ chunchach ju capuniyaʼ.
66011006	Chai ju yuʼunch ixtʼiyunʼan lapanacni axtaknicanta ju ixtachaputʼan ni laich catanonaʼ ni jantu caminaʼ ju xcan tachi chun ju avilhchan ju catatsucuyaʼ nonin ixchivinti Dios. Chai vachuʼ alin ixtachaputʼan ni lai catalapalakʼo acʼalhni ju xcan. Chai lai caʼamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni tijpachux ju makʼalhkʼajnat va tapakchux ju catanaviputunaʼ.
66011007	Chai acsni catanavikʼoyaʼ ixlhichʼalhcatʼan ixnajunca ixchivinti Dios pus ju maktiliʼ ju cataxtuyaʼ junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta caʼalactʼalasayaʼ ju yuʼunch. Chai calhajananaʼ ju yuchi. Chai caʼamakniyach ju ixtʼiyunʼan lapanacni.
66011008	Chai ixlacatunaʼan catamayaʼ lacati ju lakʼachakʼan junta maknicalh lacacurus ju Jesús. Pus ju Dios najun ni chunch junita ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan tachi ju lakʼachakʼan Sodoma chai tachi ju lacatʼun Egipto.
66011009	Pus ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti catalaktsʼiniyach ju ixlacatunaʼan lakatʼutu avilhchan a paitat. Ju anuʼ ixtʼiyunʼan ju xaʼamaknican. Chai jantu calacasqʼuincanaʼ ni lai caʼancalh amacnuca.
66011010	Chai ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacatʼun catalhikʼachanach ixlacataʼan ju yuʼunch. Chai catalhicʼataniyaʼ chai catalapuxtakniyaʼ lhakʼailaktsʼin. Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ ni na ixtaʼamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni ju ixtatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ ju anuʼ ixtʼiyunʼan ixlapanacni Dios.
66011011	Para acsni tapasalh ju anuʼ lakatʼutu avilhchan a paitat pus ju Dios axtaknichokolh isʼatsucuntiʼan chai lana takʼostavi junta ixtamanalh. Chai na kʼox tatalhanalh ju talaktsʼilh.
66011012	Pus ju acsnich ixtʼiyunʼan takʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Na pʼas ju chivinilh ni laich catakʼasmatʼaʼ. Chanich ju ajuni: ―Atʼatʼitch ju ani. Chai lana tapuʼalh ju ataputsʼi ju lactʼiyan. Chai na kʼoxich talaktsʼilh ju ixtʼalaxcaiʼan.
66011013	Chai ju anuʼ pantsʼiquis lana na pʼas tataclh ju lacatʼun. Chai ju tamin cientos chakaʼ ju ixyanalh ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan lakacavin chakaʼ takʼalhikʼo junta lai. Chai acsni tataclh ju lacatʼun pus tani lakatujun milh lapanacni. Chai ju aliʼin na tatalhanalh chai talakʼaya ju Dios ju vilhcha lactʼiyan.
66011014	Pus chunch ju tapasalh ju ixlhilakatʼui makʼalhkʼajnat chai vatsʼalhti caʼalinaʼ ju ixlhilakatʼutu.
66011015	Pus ju acsnich sunulh ju iskʼolh ju ixlhipumatujun anquilh. Chai lana na pumalhu ju na pʼas ixtachivinacha ju lactʼiyan ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Ixtanajun: Ju chavai quiDiosʼan chai ju Cristo catamalacasuyaʼ ixtachaputʼan. Chai catalhinonkʼalhiyaʼ ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66011016	Pus ju ixpumapʼuxamtʼatʼi papanin ixtavilanalh lacakʼai ixputolanʼan laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ Dios. Pus ju yuʼunch lana tataquilhputanilh ju Dios chai talakʼayalh.
66011017	Ixtajuni: Ji quiʼucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼoʼui tachi chun ju taxtokni uxintʼi ju ixtʼaʼun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai atsʼucʼukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch. Pus iclaxtakniyau lakʼailaktsʼiuch ni chʼapʼatʼa ju mimpokʼai chai lhinaʼunch ju chavai.
66011018	Pus ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ tatalhkʼamalh. Para vachuʼ tʼalhkʼamch ju uxintʼi. Chai chilh ju chavai ju avilhchan acsni calaktsʼintanucanach ju tanitach. Vachuʼ chilh ju avilhchan acsni axtʼakniyaʼ ixtalhajaʼan ju milapanacni chai ju ixtanajun ju minchivinti chai ju salaka alaktsʼin chai ju na tatalhoniyan. Axtʼaknikʼoyaʼ chux. Mas yuʼunch ju jantu tuʼuʼ ixtapalhniʼan chai vachuʼ yuʼunch ju xalackʼajin tajunita. Chai chilh ju chavai ju avilhchan acsni amamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju na ixtaʼamamakʼalhkʼajninin ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66011019	Pus ju acsnich ju lactʼiyan lana malhtekʼacalh ju laʼixpujitat Dios chai istasui laʼixpulacni ju kʼai pʼaklat junta ixmakʼacanta ju chivinti ju ixʼalaclhitʼatakʼoxita ju Dios ju israelitanin. Chai lana makʼalipnilh. Chai na pʼas lacchivinincalh. Chai tʼasalh ju tʼajin. Chai tataclh ju lacatʼun. Chai tamachilh ju chajʼit.
66012001	Chai alilh ju lactʼiyan lakatam kʼai lhamakʼan. Yuchi ni tasu pumatam chakoʼulh ju ixlakchʼita ju avilhchan. Chai ixpuchʼantai ju malhquiyuʼ. Chai laʼisʼaktsulh ixʼalin ixcorona junta ixmucʼacanta lakacautʼui stʼacu.
66012002	Chai ixpacxanta isʼaskʼatʼa. Chai ni na ixtʼajun makʼalhkʼajnaʼ pus na pʼas istʼasai ni va laich sokʼon camaklakʼavanalh.
66012003	Chai tasuchokopa alakatam lhamakʼan ju lactʼiyan. Yuchi ni tasu lakatam makakʼai lu ju na slapulh ixjunita. Chai ju yuchi ixpacxanta lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakacau ixʼakalokot chai lakatamin ixcorona laʼixlacʼaktsulh.
66012004	Chai ju anuʼ kʼai lu laʼisʼista amapatajuni ju stʼacu. Tatamachilh tus lacatʼun. Para jantu ixchaʼanta paitat ju stʼacu ju patajulh. Chai ju anuʼ kʼai lu taya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju na ixlokʼomputunch ni va caʼixʼunilh ju isʼaskʼatʼa ju ixmaklakʼaulich.
66012005	Pus ju chakoʼulh maklakʼaulh pumatam tsʼalh. Yuchach ju kʼai ucxtin catalhimispayaʼ tachi chun ju lapanacni. Chai ju tuchi canonaʼ ju yuchi yuchach ju cataquiclacaʼiyaʼ ju lapanacni. Para ju isʼaskʼatʼa ju anuʼ chakoʼulh lhiʼancalh junta vilhcha ju Dios tus lacakʼai ixputolan.
66012006	Chai ju anuʼ chakoʼulh atsʼalaʼalh junta va aseknicʼa junta ixlakʼoxinita ju Dios. Anchach junta lai camavacalh tam milh a lakatʼui cientos a sesenta avilhchan.
66012007	Chai alilh ju kʼai lasat ju lactʼiyan. Pus ju Miqui yuchi ju lhinajun laʼixtalhavatʼan ixʼanquilhnin Dios. Pus ju yuchi chai ju ixʼanquilhnin tatʼalasalh ju makakʼai lu chai ju ixʼanquilhnin ju makakʼai lu.
66012008	Para tatsʼankʼa ju makakʼai lu chai ixʼanquilhnin. Chai jantu lai tatsuculh ju lactʼiyan.
66012009	Pus lana tixcoxtucalh ju lactʼiyan ju kʼai lu. Yuchach ju anuʼ lu ju makʼaniya ixtʼajunch. Yuchach ju lhacaticuru chai Satanás juncan. Yuchach ju aʼokxchokʼoi tachi chun ju lapanacni. Pus acsni lhajacalh ju makakʼai lu acsnich ju tin macamincalh tus ani lacatʼun. Chai ju ixʼanquilhnin alactʼamacamincalh.
66012010	Chai ickʼasmatlh ni na pʼas ixchivincan ju lactʼiyan ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Ixnajun: ―Ju chavai chilh ju avilhchan acsni caʼamakʼalhtaxtuyaʼ ixlapanacni ju Dios. Catasuyaʼ ni vasalh alin ju ixtachaputʼan ju Dios chai ju Cristo. Pus putasui ni alin ixtachaputʼan ni tixcauxtucalh ju ixʼachivixtʼakʼa ju quiʼalakʼavinʼan. Tontacuj chai tontatsʼis ixʼan achivixtaknaʼ laʼixmacni Dios.
66012011	Para ju quiʼalakʼavinʼan tatʼalalhajalh ju anuʼ kʼai lu. Tapulhajalh ixʼacʼalhni ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego chai laʼixchivintiʼan junta ixtanajun ni laʼixlhichux ixʼalhunutʼan ixtalhilaksi ju Jesucristo. Chai ju yuʼunch jantu tuʼuʼ ixtalhiulai ju isʼatsucuntiʼan mas catanilhch.
66012012	Pus ni alhajanalh ju Cristo pus yuchi calhiʼalinaʼ ju kʼachat ju lactʼiyan. Na catakʼachanach tachi chun ju tatʼajun ju anch. Para painiʼitnich ju uxijnan ju tʼonatʼit ju lacatʼun chai ju lacaʼalama. Painiʼitnich untʼatʼit ni taquilakquilatachin ju uxijnan ju lhacaticuru. Chai slivasalh talhkʼaman ju yuchi ni cʼatsai ni jantu makʼan catichʼalhcatnalh. ―Chunch ju naulh ju anuʼ ju ixchivinin.
66012013	Chai ju kʼai lu acsni tixcolhimincalh tus lacatʼun pus lana chʼakʼokʼaxma ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju ixmaklakʼajunta istsʼalh.
66012014	Para lana xtaknicalh lakatʼui ixpakʼachu ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Chunch ixjunita ju ixpakʼachu tachi ixpakʼachu ju kʼai kʼatsʼokʼo. Ju chunch ni lai capulackʼosmakʼanaʼ ju kʼai lu. Laich caʼalhtʼilitniʼalh junta aseknicʼa junta ixlakʼoxinita ju Dios. Anchach junta lai camavacalh lakatʼutu cʼata a paitat.
66012015	Chai ju anuʼ kʼai lu tsuculh quilhtaxtunuʼ ju xcan tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼai xcan. Chai ju xcan taima ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ni va ixlacasqʼuin ju kʼai lu ni camuxtulh ju anuʼ chakoʼulh.
66012016	Para ju lacatʼun aktaijulh ju chakoʼulh. Pus lana lakchʼuchʼuʼokʼo ju xcan. Chai maxixilh ju kʼai xcan ju ixquilhtaxtuta ju kʼai lu.
66012017	Pus ju acsnich ju kʼai lu slivasalh tʼalaxcailich ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Pus alh alactʼalasanaʼ ju aliʼin isʼaskʼatʼan ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Yuʼunch ju tamuctaxtui tachi ju najun laʼixlhamapʼaksin ju Dios chai va tachi talhilacaʼanta ju Jesucristo.
66013001	Pus ju quitʼin ictachʼantalh lacacucu laʼixquilhtuʼ alama. Chai iclaktsʼilh ni tacutlh lacaʼalama lakatam maktiliʼ. Chai ixʼalin lakacau ixʼakalokot chai lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakatamin ixcorona laʼixʼakalokot. Chai ju lakatamin isʼaktsulh ju yuchi ixmuntiʼulacanta ju tapakaʼut ju lana jantu kʼox lhiulai ju Dios.
66013002	Pus ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju iclaktsʼilh chunch ixjunita ju ixlacatuna tachi ju tuʼuʼ leopardo. Chai ju ixchʼajaʼ chunch ixjunita tachi ixchʼajaʼ ju tuʼuʼ oso. Chai ju ixquilhni chunch ixjunita tachi ixquilhni ju tuʼuʼ león. Chai ju kʼai lu xtaknilh ju ani maktiliʼ ixtachaput chai ixpuʼucxtin.
66013003	Pus na iscʼatsani ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju lakatam ju isʼaktsulh. Chai istasui tachi ju va lai caʼixpuni. Para macaxnilh junta iscʼatsani. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacatʼun tachʼakʼokʼalh ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai na talhamakʼaninilh.
66013004	Pus ju lapanacni talakʼayalh ju kʼai lu ni ixtaknita ixtachaput ju maktiliʼ. Vachuʼ talakʼayalh ju maktiliʼ. Ixtanajun: ―Tis chavaich ju laich ixtʼachunch cava ju maktiliʼ. Chai tis chavaich ju lai catʼalasa ju yuchi.
66013005	Chai ju maktiliʼ xtaknicalh ixtachaput ni laich na jokʼat cachivinilh chai vachuʼ canaulh macxcai chivinti ixlacata ju Dios. Chai yau junicalh ni laich cachʼalhcatnanaʼ lakatʼutu cʼata a paitat.
66013006	Pus na macxcai chivinti ixnajun ixlacata Dios chai ixlacata ju ixpujitat Dios chai ixlacataʼan ju tatʼajun ju lactʼiyan.
66013007	Chai yau junicalh ni laich caʼalactʼalasa ju talhilacaʼanta ju Cristo chai laich caʼalhajanalh. Chai vachuʼ xtaknicalh ixtachaput ni ixʼucxtinʼan cava tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti.
66013008	Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ catalakʼayayaʼ ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Para alin ju lapanacni ju atsʼokʼulacanta laʼixʼalhiqui ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ju ixmaknicanta. Chai anch ju najun tichi chavaich ju alin isʼatsucunti jonkʼalhita. Chai ixtapakaʼut ju kʼantam kʼantam anch ju istsʼokʼulacanta tus acsni tucaʼ ixnavicantacha ju lacamunutpaʼ. Pus ju yuʼunch ju anch atsʼokʼulacanta jantu catitalakʼaya ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.
66013009	Pus ni xamatiʼ alin ixpakʼasmatni chach kʼasmatlh.
66013010	Ju talhiʼan lacapulachʼin ixtʼalapanac pus vana va chunch ju canavicanaʼ. Chai ju lacamachita amakninin pus lacamachita capumaknichokocanaʼ. Pus yuchi lhitasqʼuini ni catachʼixlh ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju talhilacaʼanta ju Dios chai va tachi catalhilaksilhch ju yuchi.
66013011	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh alakatam maktiliʼ ju taʼacxtulh ju lacatʼun. Chai ixʼalin lakatʼui lactʼicstʼi ixʼakalokot tachi ixʼakalokot ju tuʼuʼ askʼatʼa borrego. Chai chunch ju ixchivinin tachi ju ixchivinin ju anuʼ makakʼai lu.
66013012	Chai ixʼalin ixtachaput tachi ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ. Chai tavilh laʼixpuʼucxtin laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ chai tapʼastu ajuni ju lapanacni ni catalakʼayalh ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ. Yuchi ju macaxnilh junta iscʼatsani chai istasui tachi ju va lai caʼixnilh.
66013013	Chai ju anuʼ ixlhilakatʼui maktiliʼ na lai ixnavi ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Mas yuchi ju jipi lai ixmakʼalhtajui ju lactʼiyan. Ixchin ju lacatʼun laʼixʼalacʼavantiʼan ju lapanacni.
66013014	Chai yau junicalh ni laich canavi laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Chai yuchi ju apuʼokxchokʼolh ju lapanacni ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Va ajuni ni catalapalaxtulh tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju iscʼatsani lacamachita para jantu xani.
66013015	Chai ixtaknicanta ixtachaput ni laich caxtakniyaʼ isʼatsucunti ju anuʼ lapalaxtucanta tachi ixlacatuna ju maktiliʼ. Pus ju chunch ju anuʼ ju ixlapalaxtucanta naulh ni camaknicanaʼ va tichi chavaich ju jantu calakʼayayaʼ ju yuchi.
66013016	Chai ju ixlhipumatʼui maktiliʼ lhinaulh ni camichicalh tachi chun ju lapanacni laʼixlhicana ixlacmacaʼan u laʼismuntsanʼan. Chux ju xalactʼicstʼin chai ju xalackʼajin. Chux ju makʼalinin chai ju quilhpatinin. Chux ju matiʼ ixʼucxtinʼan chai ju va xalapanacni ixtajunita.
66013017	Pus ju chunch jantu lai xamatiʼ catitamaulh ju tuʼuʼ u castʼalh ju tuʼuʼ ni jantu michicanta. Pus ju ixʼalhimichican yuchi ixtapakaʼut ju maktiliʼ ju istsʼokcanta lacachivinti u lacaʼaputekʼenta ju alhimispacan ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.
66013018	Pus na tasqʼuini ju kʼox acʼatsanti ni lai machakxacan ju ani. Pus ju na lai amachakxanan laich camispayaʼ ixʼaputekʼenti ju maktiliʼ. Pus ju anuʼ aputekʼenti nomputun ixtapakaʼut tam xamatiʼ. Pus ju anuʼ aputekʼenti yuchi ju lakachaxan cientos a sesenta y seis.
66014001	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ni ixyacha laxatalhpa Sion. Chai vachuʼ ixtayanancha tam cientos a cuarenta y cuatro milh lapanacni. Chai si ixtalacapavilanankʼo ixtapakaʼut ju Askʼatʼa Borrego chai ixtapakaʼut ju ixpai.
66014002	Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju mincha lactʼiyan. Chai istʼasat chunch ixjunita tachi ixtalhavanti xcan chai tachi istʼasat ju tʼajin acsni na pʼas tʼasai. Ju anuʼ chivinti ju ickʼasmatlh chunch ixjunita tachi acsni na lhu sacan ju arpa.
66014003	Chai ixtamilhpaich lakatam sastʼi milhpat laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan junta ixvi ju Dios chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ju pumatʼatʼi atapacxat chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ju papanin. Chai jantu xamatiʼ lai xalani ju anuʼ milhpat. Va yuʼunch ju lapanacni ju ixtachaʼanta tam cientos a cuarenta y cuatro milh. Yuʼunch ju ixʼalacmakʼalhtaxtucanta ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66014004	Yuʼunch ju jantu tavanan ixtamacajunta ju Dios. Va tachi ixtalhilaksita ju yuchi. Chai yuʼunchach ju tachʼakʼokʼai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego mas vanta anchach ju caʼalh. Yuʼunchach ju pʼulhnan alhimalakxtucanta sia ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ ni laich ixlapanacni catava ju Dios chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
66014005	Chai ju yuʼunch jantu tavanan ixtaʼaʼokxchokʼonun. Na salaka tajunita.
66014006	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ju alhtʼilitniʼalh laʼixlacaitat lactʼiyan. Chai ixlhiʼanta ju chivinti ixlacata ju Cristo ju jantu tavanan catimapaxacalh. Chai ju anquilh yuchi lhilhiʼanta ni laich caʼajunilh tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti.
66014007	Chai ju anuʼ anquilh na pʼas chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Naulh: ―Atʼalhonitʼit ju Dios chai alakʼayatʼit ni chilh ju pantsʼiquis acsni camucʼacanaʼ ju talakʼalhin. Alhilacʼapʼitʼit ju yuchi ju navita ju tʼiyan chai ju lacatʼun chai ju alama chai junta taʼacxtui ju xcan.
66014008	Chai apumatam anquilh chʼakʼokʼalh ju xapʼulhnan anquilh. Chai ixnajun: ―Taiʼinicalh ixtachaput ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan Babilonia ni yuchi ju xaʼamalanikʼojui tachi chun ju lapanacni ixkʼachanica ju alactuʼunti tachi ju ixnavi ju yuchi.
66014009	Chai ixlhipumatʼutu anquilh chʼakʼokʼalh chai na pʼas chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Pus na pʼas quilhuʼalh ni xamatiʼ calakʼayayaʼ ju maktiliʼ chai ju lapalaxtucanta tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ni calakʼaʼiyaʼ ni camichicalh laʼismuntsan u laʼixmacaʼ pus ju yuchi ma slivasalh camakʼalhkʼajnanaʼ laʼixtalhkʼamti ju Dios. Chai ma lana matiʼ cajunaʼ ju ixʼamapainicaʼan ju acsnich. Ma na camamakʼalhkʼajnicanaʼ lacajipi chai lacaʼazufre laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ixʼanquilhnin Dios chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
66014011	Chai junta tamakʼalhkʼajnan ju yuʼunch ma va tachi jinilatach. Chai ma jantu tavanan catitaʼastacnalh ju yuʼunch ju tamaklacaʼanita ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ ju talapalaxtulh tachi ixlacatuna ju maktiliʼ chai ju alhimichicanta ixtapakaʼut ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Ma tontacuj chai tontatsʼis catamakʼalhkʼajnanaʼ.
66014012	Pus ma yuchi lhitasqʼuini ni catachʼixlh ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju talhilacaʼanta ju Cristo. Ma cataquiclacaʼiyach ixlhamapʼaksin ju Dios chai ma va tachi catalhilacaʼanaʼ ju Jesús.
66014013	Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Chai quijuni: ―Chanich atsʼokʼulatʼi: “Ma na takʼachan ju tani ju talhilacaʼankʼalhita ju Jesús”. Chai ju Spiritu Santu ma chani najun: “Ma na takʼachan ni taʼastacnantach ju chavai mas na tamakʼalhkʼajnanta ixnavinica ixlhichʼalhcat ju Dios chai mas na talhixkʼopta. Para pastacnikʼalhican tuchi ixtanavinita acsni ixtavilanalhcaʼ ju ani lacamunutpaʼ”.
66014014	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju xnapapa ataputsʼi. Chai laʼixʼucxni ju anuʼ ataputsʼi ixvi pumatam ju chunch istasui tachi ju yuchi ju malakachachilh ju Dios ni lapanac catsucuyaʼ ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Chai ixʼalin ixcorona si oro chai ixchʼapata lakatam machita ju na quicxtui chai akxaxcʼavincʼa.
66014015	Chai apumatam anquilh taxtuchilh lacakʼai pujitat chai na pʼas chivinilh acsni xakʼala ju anuʼ ju ixvi lacaʼataputsʼi. Chunch ju chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai junich: ―Amanutʼich ju mimachita lacalhitai. Achʼakxʼitʼich ju xatocʼat ju achʼananti. Pus chilh ju avilhchan tachi ju lai apʼuchʼakxʼitʼi ni na cʼatʼatach ju xatocʼat. ―Chunch ju naulh ju anquilh.
66014016	Pus ju anuʼ ju ixvi lacaʼataputsʼi lana macatachini ju ixmachita ju lacatʼun. Chai lana puchakxʼikʼo ju xaʼachʼananti.
66014017	Chai taxtulh apumatam anquilh lacakʼai pujitat ju yacha lactʼiyan. Chai vachuʼ ixchʼapata ixmachita ju na ixquicxtui.
66014018	Pus ju acsnich taxtulh apumatam anquilh junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai ixʼalin ixtachaput ni lai camamactayani ju jipi vanta anchach. Chai ju yuchi lana na pʼas ju chivinilh acsni xakʼala ju anuʼ ixchʼapata ixmachita ju na ixquicxtui. Junich: ―Amanutʼich ju mimachita lacalhitai. Apʼuchʼakxtʼich ju xalhiʼut ju xaqʼuiu uvas ju lacatʼun ni na cʼatʼatach ju xaʼuvas. ―Chunch ju naulh ju anquilh.
66014019	Pus ju anquilh puchʼalhcatnalh ju ixmachita ju ani lacatʼun chai lana puchakxʼikʼo ju xaʼuvas ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Chai macaʼankʼo lacakʼai puchʼipni ni lai camaxtunicanaʼ ju xaxcan. Ju chunch va nomputun ni slivasalh na caʼamamakʼalhkʼajnininaʼ ju Dios laʼixtalhkʼamti.
66014020	Pus ju anuʼ kʼai puchʼipni ixya lacamacni ju lakʼachakʼan. Chai ju anuʼ lacapuchʼipni si acʼalhni ju taxtulh tus chaʼalh laʼixkʼalhtsan ju caballo. Chunch ju ixlhikʼalhtankʼai xajun. Chai alhtanalh ju acʼalhni lakatʼutu cientos kilómetros.
66015001	Chai iclaktsʼilh alakatam lhamakʼan ju lactʼiyan. Chai slivasalh na kʼai lhamakʼan ixjunita. Pus iclaktsʼilh ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin chai pumatamin ju sia yuʼunch ixtachʼapata lakatamin makʼalhkʼajnat ju tamacamimputun ju ani lacatʼun. Chai ju ani lakatujun makʼalhkʼajnat va yuchach cajunaʼ. Yuchach ju capumaclayaʼ ju Dios ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju axtakni ju lapanacni ju ani lacatʼun.
66015002	Pus iclaktsʼilh tachi tuʼuʼ atantsʼin ju na stalankʼa ixjunita. Para istasui tachi ju va ixlhiya ju jipi. Chai anch ixtayanalh laʼixquilhtuʼ ju anuʼ atantsʼin ju lapanacni ju jantu ixtanavinita ixkʼachat ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ lapalaxtucanta tachi ju maktiliʼ. Chai vachuʼ jantu ixtalakʼaʼita ni caʼamichicalh laxalhaputʼekʼenti ixtapakaʼut ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Chai ju yuʼunch ixtachʼapata ju ixʼarpaʼan. Yuchi ju ixʼaxtaknita ju Dios.
66015003	Chai ixtamilhpaich ixmilhpat ju Moisés junta istsʼokʼulata. Ju Moisés ixlapanac Dios ixjunita. Chai vachuʼ ixtamilhpai ixmilhpat ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Ixtanajun: Slivasalh na kʼai lhamakʼan ju tuchʼi navi ju uxintʼi ji ucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼoʼui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Soknicʼa ju navi tuʼuʼ chai aktsʼiya muctʼaxtʼui ju minchivinti ju uxintʼi ju kʼai ixʼucxtin unitʼa tachi chun ju amachakʼan lacamunutpaʼ.
66015004	Tis chavaich ju jantu catalhoniyan chai jantu calakʼayayan ju uxintʼi ji ucxtin ni va uxintʼi ju salakaʼat. Pus tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ catalakminanch chai catalakʼayayan. Chunch ju aʼulhtʼucʼanaʼ ni laktsʼincʼantʼa ni na soknicʼa ju navi.
66015005	Chai acsni tapasakʼo ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh ni ilhtekʼai ju kʼai pujitat lactʼiyan. Anchach junta vi ju Dios chai anch junta ixmakʼacanta ju lhtʼakʼalh chiux junta istsʼokcanta ju lhamapʼaksin.
66015006	Pus lacpujitat tataxtulh ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata lakatamin makʼalhkʼajnat ju ixmacamimputun ju lacatʼun. Chai ju yuʼunch ixtalakchʼita ju kʼoxi ixpumpuʼan ju slivasalh na xnapapa ixjunita. Chai ixʼatanquilhakchʼimucʼacanta ju liston ju oro ixjunita.
66015007	Chai pumatam ju ixlhipumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat axtaknikʼo ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin lakatamin ixpumapʼunʼan si oro. Chai ju anuʼ pumapʼun isʼaktsamanta ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju camacaminaʼ ju Dios ju tʼonkʼalhi.
66015008	Chai ju anuʼ pujitat na aktsamalh ju jin chai malacasucalh ni yuchi ju Dios ju tachapun chai yuchi ju xakʼai tucan. Chai jantu lai xamatiʼ ixtanui ju anch lacpujitat tus catapasakʼoyach ju anuʼ lakatujun makʼalhkʼajnat ju ixtachʼapata ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin.
66016001	Pus ju acsnich ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju minchalh lacpujitat. Chani ajuni ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin: ―Inchitʼit. Axtʼekʼemacʼapʼitʼit ju lacatʼun ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju xalhinajun ju Dios ixmacaʼanca. Yuchi ju tajun lacalakatujun mimpumapʼunʼan.
66016002	Pus alh ju xapʼulhnan anquilh chai xtʼekʼemacamilh ju lacatʼun ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai lana alilh ju macxcai istsʼitsʼiʼan ju lapanacni ju ixtapacxanta ixlhamichin ju maktiliʼ chai tamaklacaʼanilh ju ixlapalaxtucanta tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.
66016003	Pus ju ixlhipumatʼui anquilh vachuʼ xtʼekʼemacamilh ju lacaʼalama ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai lana tapalakʼo acʼalhni tachi ju tamai acʼalhni junta lamaknican. Pus tachi chun ju atapacxat ju ixtʼajun lacaʼalama tanikʼo.
66016004	Chai ixlhipumatʼutu anquilh vachuʼ xtʼekʼemacamilh ju lacxcan ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Vachuʼ taju junta taʼacxtui ju xcan. Pus lana si acʼalhni jonkʼo.
66016005	Chai ickʼasmatlh ni chivinilh ju anquilh ju lakʼalhilh ju xcan. Chani naulh: ―Aktsʼiya soknicʼa ju navi acsni xtʼakʼa ju chunch makʼalhkʼajnat ji uxintʼi ju na salakaʼat. Ju uxintʼi tʼaʼun chai tus va tavananch ixtʼaʼun.
66016006	Chunch icjunan ni yuʼunch ju amamakʼalhkʼajni ju chavai ju taʼamaxtunilh ixʼacʼalhniʼan ju milapanacni chai ju ixtanajun ju minchivinti. Chai ju chavai ju uxintʼi amakʼotʼutʼa ju xcan ju lapʼalatʼi acʼalhni. Pus ixlhijunch ni chunch ju caʼaʼulhtucalh.
66016007	Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju taxtuchalh junta ixavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai chani naulh: ―Ji ucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼoʼui tachi chun ju taxtokni ju uxintʼi aktsʼiya muctʼaxtʼui ju minchivinti chai sok ju navi acsni xtʼakʼa ju makʼalhkʼajnat. ―Chunch ju naulh.
66016008	Pus ju ixlhipumatʼatʼi anquilh xtʼekʼemacaʼalh ju lacaʼavilhchan ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai xtaknicalh ju avilhchan ixtachaput ni laich slivasalh caʼalacamaccha ju lapanacni chai catalackʼaimakataxtulh.
66016009	Pus ju lapanacni slivasalh na talaclacacha ju lacaʼascʼunuʼ. Chai na macxcai chivinti tajunilh ju Dios ju ixlhinajun ni caʼalilh ju chunch makʼalhkʼajnat. Para nin chunch jantu tavanan tam tapastaclh nin yuchi ni laich catalakʼaya.
66016010	Chai ju ixlhipumaquis anquilh xtʼekʼemacamilh laʼixputolan ju maktiliʼ ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Pus lana putsʼiskʼo junta ixlhinajun ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju ixtacutcha lacaʼalama. Chai ju lapanacni na ixtapakʼatsʼi ju isimakʼatʼan ni na ixtamakʼalhkʼajnan.
66016011	Chai tajuni macxcai chivinti ju Dios ju vilhcha lactʼiyan ni ixtatʼajun makʼalhkʼajnin ni na lhu lana ixʼalin ju istsʼitsʼiʼan. Para mas chunch ju ixtamakʼalhkʼajnan jantu tavanan tam tapastaclh ixlacata ju tuchi ixtanavi.
66016012	Pus ju ixlhipumachaxan anquilh xtʼekʼemacamilh laxakʼai xcan Eufrates ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Pus lana xixkʼo ju xcan. Ju chunch ni jantu xcai catatapasayaʼ ju xaʼucxtinin ju cataminanta ju lhichʼatoʼanta ni va cataminaʼ lasanin.
66016013	Chai iclaktsʼilh pumatʼutu lhacaticurulhni. Ju pumatam taxtulh laʼixquilhni ju kʼai lu. Chai pumatam taxtulh laʼixquilhni ju maktiliʼ. Chai apumatam taxtulh laʼixquilhni ju anuʼ lapanac ju istasui tachi ixlapanac Dios mas jantu. Chai ju anuʼ ixpumatʼutuʼan chunch istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ venkʼen.
66016014	Pus ju yuʼunch lhacaticurulhni tajunita. Chai lai tanavi ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Pus talakʼan ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ni va tamakʼaixtokputun ni laich catalasayaʼ acsni cachinaʼ ju kʼai avilhchan. Ju acsnich catatʼalasayaʼ ju Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni.
66016015	Acsnich ju caminaʼ ju Jesús tachi ju naulh. Chunch tachi tam akʼalhonaʼ ni chin acsni jantu cʼatsacan ni laich cachilh ju acs pantsʼiquis. Pus na kʼachanch ju skʼala tsucui chai lhistʼacʼa ju snapapa ixpumpuʼ ni jantu va kʼai tsasau cajunlh chai camaxanalh ni matiʼ ju xnapapa ju ixpumpuʼ.
66016016	Pus amakʼaixtokcalh ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin junta Armagedón juncan lacalhihebreo.
66016017	Chai ju ixlhipumatujun anquilh xtʼekʼemacaʼalh ju lacaʼun ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai lana taxtulh lakatam chivinti lacpujitat. Anchach junta ixya ju kʼai putolan. Chai ixnajun: ―Va yuchach ju ani ju makʼalhkʼajnat.
66016018	Chai lana makʼalipnilh. Chai na pʼas lacchivincalh. Chai na pʼas tʼasalh ju tʼajin. Chai na pʼas tataclh ju lacatʼun. Pus tus acsni tavanan alilh ju lapanacni ju ani lacamunutpaʼ jantu tavanan ixlaktsʼincanta ni catataclh ju lacatʼun tachi ju lalh ju acsni.
66016019	Pus ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan ju Babilonia ixjuncan pumakatʼutu pupaklh chai takʼalhikʼo. Chai tachi chun ju kʼai lakʼachakʼanixni ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ lana takʼalhikʼo. Chai ju Dios pastaclh ju talakʼalhin ju ixtanavita ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan. Chai naulh ni vasalh camispayaʼ ixtatsʼinqʼuit ju ixtalhkʼamti.
66016020	Pus tachi chun ju lactʼicstʼi lacatʼun ju ixvi lacaʼalama tatsʼankʼakʼo. Chai matiʼ va ju talhpa.
66016021	Chai lackʼai chajʼit ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Ixtatsʼinqʼui tachi tʼupʼuxam kilo ju lakatamin. Chai ju lapanacni tajuni macxcai chivinti ju Dios ixlacata ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju alilh ni tamachilh ju chajʼit. Slivasalh na kʼai lhitalhan va.
66017001	Pus ju acsnich quilakmilh pumatam sia yuʼunch ju anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata ju lakatamin ixpumapʼunʼan. Chai quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Chai acmasuniyanch ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnat ju anuʼ alactuʼunu chakoʼulh ju na lhu puvi ju xcan.
66017002	Yuchach ju tatʼaʼalactuʼununta ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju lacamunutpaʼ. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ tachi ju va talhitʼakʼapʼatach ju va ixkʼachanicach ju ixʼalactuʼuntiʼan ju xaʼamasuni ju anuʼ chakoʼulh.
66017003	Chai ju Spiritu Santu xaquimapaxanita ju quiʼalacʼavanti chai iclaktsʼilh ju ani tachi ju va laquiʼaklakʼavanti. Pus tachi ju va quilhiʼalh ju anuʼ anquilh junta na aseknicʼa ixjunita. Chai iclaktsʼilh pumatam chakoʼulh ju ixpujucʼalh lakatam maktiliʼ ju na slapulh ixjunita. Chai laʼixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ si lana istsʼokʼulacanta macxcai tapakaʼut. Chai ixʼalin lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakacau ixʼakalokot.
66017004	Chai ju chakoʼulh ixlhimalakchʼininta morado chai slapulh pumpuʼ. Chai ixlhimaxantilacanta ju oro chai aliʼ lactʼicstʼi chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh chai ju perlas. Chai ixchʼapata lakatam tasa si oro. Ju yuchi na ixʼaktsamanta ju tuchi na tsʼisi ju Dios chai ju tuchi na lhquiliqui ju navi laʼixʼalactuʼunti.
66017005	Chai ixmuntitsʼokcanta lakatam tapakaʼut ju jantu lai machakxacan. Chai ixnajun: “Xakʼai Babilonia. Ixnatiʼan ju lakachapu tʼacunin chai ju taxtokni ju na lhitsʼisit ju alin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ”.
66017006	Chai iclaktsʼilh ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ni na ixlhitʼakʼapʼatach ju ixʼacʼalhniʼan ju lapanacni ju ixtalhilacaʼanta ju Jesús ni ixlhinajuntach ixʼamaknica. Chai acsni iclaktsʼilh slivasalh iclhamakʼaninilh ju tuchi xacmasunicanta.
66017007	Para ju anquilh quijuni: ―Tajuch ni va lhamakʼanininch ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Quitʼin ju acmavasalaniyan ju ixlacata ju anuʼ chakoʼulh chai ixlacata ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju pujucʼalh. Yuchi ju alin lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakacau ixʼakalokot.
66017008	Pus ju anuʼ slapulh maktiliʼ ju xalaktsʼin ixtʼajun para ju chavai nitach. Para cataʼacxtuchokotachilh junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Para aktsʼiya camaclacanaʼ. Chai na catalhamakʼanininaʼ ju maktʼiliʼ ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju lacamunutpaʼ acsni catalaktsʼinchokoyaʼ ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Para ju chunch catalayaʼ jantu atsʼokʼulacanta lacaʼalhiqui junta najun tichi chavaʼitnich ju alin ju isʼatsucuntiʼan ju jonkʼalhita. Pus ixtapakaʼutʼan ju kʼantam kʼantam ju alin isʼatsucunti jonkʼalhita istsʼokʼulacantacha tus acsni tucaʼ ixnavicanta ju lacamunutpaʼ. Para ju aliʼin lapanacni catalhamakʼanininaʼ ju maktiliʼ ni talaktsʼinchokoi ju yuchi. Tacʼatsai ni ixtʼajun para nilh chai ju chavai tʼonchokoi.
66017009	Pus ju ani na tasqʼuini ju kʼox acʼatsanti ni acmachakxa. Pus ju anuʼ lakatujun isʼaktsulh ju maktiliʼ yuchi ju laktsʼipaxcavacan ju anuʼ lakatujun talhpa junta vi ju chakoʼulh.
66017010	Vachuʼ laktsʼipaxcavacan ixpumatujunʼan kʼai ucxtinin. Pus ju ixpumaquisiʼan alhajacalh. Ju pumatam tʼajuncaʼ. Ju pumatam tucaʼ tasui. Para acsni caminach jantu makʼan catolaʼ laʼixpuʼucxtin.
66017011	Chai ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju ixtʼajun chai nitach ju chavai yuchach ju ixlhipumatsajin ucxtin cajunaʼ. Ixtʼalapanac cajunaʼ ju ixlhipumatujunʼan ju pʼulhnan ixtatʼajun. Para vachuʼ camaclacanaʼ.
66017012	Chai ju anuʼ lakacau ixʼakalokot ju anuʼ slapulh maktiliʼ ju laktsʼintʼa yuchi laktsʼipaxcavacan ju ixpumacauʼan ucxtinin. Ju yuʼunch tucaʼ axtaknican ixpuʼucxtinʼan. Para catʼaʼaxtaknicanaʼ ju maktiliʼ ixpokʼaiʼan chai va tam hora ju lai catalhinonaʼ.
66017013	Ju yuʼunch va lakatam junita ixʼatalacpastʼacʼatʼan. Chai taxtakni ixpokʼaiʼan ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.
66017014	Chai ju yuʼunch catatʼalasayaʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Para ju Askʼatʼa Borrego calhajananaʼ ni yuchi ju tucan ucxtin tachi chun ju ucxtinin. Chai yuchi ju tucan xakʼai tachi chun ju xalackʼajin. Chai ju alactʼavi atʼasanicanta chai asacxtucanta chai na tamuctaxtui ju ixchivinti ju yuchi.
66017015	Chai vachuʼ chani quijunilh ju anquilh: ―Ju anuʼ xcan ju laktsʼintʼa junta ixvi ju anuʼ alactuʼunu chakoʼulh yuchi laktsʼipaxcavacan tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai tachivinin tijpachux chivinti.
66017016	Chai ju anuʼ lakacau akalokot ju laktsʼintʼa ju ixlaccʼatujucalh ju anuʼ maktiliʼ cataxcayach ju chakoʼulh. Chai ixlacataʼan ju yuʼunch camaconicanaʼ ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Chai ju yuchi va kʼai tsasau camaconicanaʼ. Chai ju lakacau akalokot chai ju maktiliʼ tachi ju va catakʼaiʼuyach ixʼacanit chai catalacxavayach ju caxajanta.
66017017	Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ ni Dios ju xaʼamapastʼacʼani ni chunch ju catalalh tachi ju lhilhcata ju yuchi. Pus ju anuʼ lakacau akalokot catanaviyaʼ tachi ju lhilhcata ju Dios acsni va lakatam cajunaʼ ixʼatalacpastʼacʼatʼan chai acsni cataxtakniyaʼ ixpuʼucxtinʼan ju maktiliʼ tus acsni caʼuctaxtuyanta ju ixchivinti Dios.
66017018	Chai ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju laktsʼintʼa laktsʼipaxcavacan ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan ju alhijuni tachi chun ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni ju anquilh.
66018001	Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ni taxtucha ju lactʼiyan. Milhch ju lacatʼun. Chai ixpacxanta ju kʼai ixtachaput. Chai ju ani lacatʼun lana mapulhcukʼo laʼixʼamatuncunit.
66018002	Chai na pʼas chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai chani naulh: ―Lakʼalhikʼocalh ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan Babilonia. Valhch ixchakaʼan ju lhacaticurulhni. Vachuʼ anch tatanumanalh tachi chun ju tsʼokʼo ju va lhitsʼisi tavajin.
66018003	Chunchach ju ulhtucalh ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan ni yuʼunch ju amachakʼan anch ju xataʼamalanikʼojui tachi chun ju lapanacni ixkʼachanica ju alactuʼunti tachi ju ixtanavi ju yuʼunch. Chai ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju lacamunutpaʼ tatʼaʼalactuʼunulh ju yuʼunch. Chai ju saʼastʼanin ju lacamunutpaʼ na makʼalinin tapujunita ni va ixtalhakʼamanan ixtuminʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan.
66018004	Pus ju acsnich ickʼasmatlh alakatam chivinti ju mincha lactʼiyan ju chani ixnajun: ―Atʼaxtʼutʼit ju anch ji quilapanacni. Jantu xcai ni vachuʼ amaknavitʼit ju alactuʼunti. Jantu xcai ni atʼamakʼalhkʼajnantʼit ju yuʼunch vachuʼ.
66018005	Pus ju ixʼalactuʼuntiʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan chaʼanta tus lactʼiyan. Chai ju Dios jantu tavanan xacʼapʼa ju alactuʼunti ju xatanavi. ―Chunch ju naulh ju xachivinin.
66018006	Pus ni na ixtaʼalactuʼunun ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan yuchi chani alhijunicalh ju anquilhnin: ―Pus chunch ju axtʼaknitʼit ju makʼalhkʼajnat tachi ju ixtaxtʼakʼach ju yuʼunch. Paktʼui amamapʼalanitʼit ju makʼalhkʼajnat tachi ju ixtaʼalacnavich ju aliʼin. Chai ju vino ju taʼamakʼotʼunulh yuʼunch pus ju chavai amakʼotʼutʼit ju vino ju palai tucan sunilhcʼacʼa.
66018007	Chai tachi ju yuʼunch ni na kʼai ixtacʼatsan chai na lhu ixtaʼalactuʼunun pus vana va chun lhu amamakʼalhkʼajnitʼit chai lhu amamakʼaninitʼit ju yuʼunch. Pus ju yuʼunch tanajun laʼixʼalhunutʼan ni xalackʼajin tajunita chai jantu va amaconcanta chai jantu tavanan cataʼamakʼanininaʼ.
66018008	Chai ni tanajun ju chunch pus ixlhiyuchi lana va tam pantsʼiquis caʼalinaʼ ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan. Cataniyaʼ ju lapanacni. Chai caʼalinaʼ ju amakʼanit chai ju chavanti. Chai calhcukʼoyaʼ ju lakʼachakʼan. Chunch ju canavicanaʼ ni na tachapun ju ucxtin Dios. Chai yuchach ju amucʼani ju ixtalakʼalhinʼan. ―Chunch ju ajunicalh ju anquilhnin.
66018009	Chai na catalackʼalhunach. Chai ai ai catanonaʼ ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju lacamunutpaʼ ju tatʼaʼalactuʼunulh ju yuʼunch chai tatʼanavilh ju ixkʼachatʼan. Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ acsni catalaktsʼinaʼ ju xajin ni catsucuyaʼ lhcunuʼ ju lakʼachakʼan.
66018010	Na makat catatayayaʼ ni va tatalhonich ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan. Chai chanich ju catanonaʼ: ―Painich ju xakʼai lakʼachakʼan Babilonia. Na tachapun ixjunita. Para va tam pantsʼiquis xamin ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnat.
66018011	Chai tachi chun ju saʼastʼanin ju ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ na catalhikʼalhunach ju yuchi. Chai ai ai catanonaʼ. Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ ni matich ju ixʼatamonaʼan.
66018012	Na istastʼai ju oro chai plata chai chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh ixjunita chai ju perlas chai ju kʼoxiya pumpuʼ ju lino juncan chai ju morado pumpuʼ chai ju pumpuʼ ju seda juncan chai ju lakslapulh pumpuʼ chai tachi chun ju qʼuiu ju na kʼox acamin chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju navicanta lacakʼai istatsalat ju elefante chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju lhinavicanta qʼuiu ju na laklhu ixtapalh chai ju cobre chai ju tsasnat hierro chai ju chiux ju marmol juncan.
66018013	Vachuʼ istastʼai ju canela chai ju aliʼ xalhalakʼoxin vaiti chai ju pum chai ju perfume chai ju vino chai ju aceite chai ju harina chai ju trigo chai ju vacax chai borrego chai caballo chai carro chai xalapanacni. Va istastʼai ixtʼalapanacniʼan. Chai ju isʼastʼacan mas ixtachʼalhcatnan para jantu tuʼuʼ ixtalhajai ni va ixʼatamocanta.
66018014	Pus ju anuʼ astʼanin chani catajunach ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan: ―Tachi chun ju lhiʼut ju na ixʼupʼutʼunatʼit cʼacxtach ju chavai. Chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju na lackʼox ixjunita chai ju na cʼus istasui tacʼacxkʼolh. Chai jantu tavanan atʼalaktsʼinchʼokʼotʼit. ―Chunch ju catanonaʼ ju astʼanin.
66018015	Chai ju istastʼai ju anch ju lakʼachakʼan ju ani taxtokni chai ju na makʼalinin xatapujun na makat catatayayaʼ ni na catatalhoniyaʼ ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan. Na catakʼalhunaʼ. Chai ai ai catanonaʼ.
66018016	Vachuʼ chani catanonach: ―Painiʼitnich ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan ju na ixʼalin ju lackʼoxi ixpumpuʼan ju lino juncan chai ju lacmoradonicʼa ixpumpuʼan chai lacslapulh ixpumpuʼan. Chai na ixtalhachʼachʼinincanta ju oro chai ju lacatʼicstʼi chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh chai ju perlas.
66018017	Para va tam pantsʼiquis tsʼankʼakʼolh tachi chun ju ani ixmakʼalitʼan. Chai vachuʼ na makat catatayayaʼ tachi chun ju amanavin barco chai ju tapuʼalhtananch ju barco chai ju tachʼalhcatnan lacabarco chai tachi chun ju tachʼalhcatnan lacaʼalama.
66018018	Chai acsni catalaktsʼinaʼ ju xajin ni tʼajun lhcunuʼ pus na pʼas catalacchivinaʼ ni na cataʼamakʼanininaʼ. Catanonach: ―Matiʼ alakatam lakʼachakʼan ju ixtʼachunch cava tachi ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan. ―Chunch ju catanonaʼ.
66018019	Chai catamucʼayaʼ ju pokxni laʼisʼaktsulhʼan ni cacʼatsacanaʼ ni na taʼamakʼaninin. Chai na catalackʼalhunaʼ. Chai ai ai catalacnonaʼ. Pʼas catachivinaʼ acsni chani catanonaʼ: ―Painich ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan. Tachi chun ju quijnan ju amanavin barco icjuntau xacpuchʼalhcatnanau lacaʼalama chai na makʼalinin xacpujuntau ju ixmakʼalitʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan. Para va tam pantsʼiquis ju takʼalhikʼo ju lakʼachakʼan.
66018020	Alhikʼachʼantʼit ji amachakʼan lactʼiyan chai ju uxijnan ju lhilacʼapʼinatʼit ju Jesús chai ju uxijnan ju ixtamalakachan Jesús untʼatʼit chai ju uxijnan ju nonatʼit ixchivinti Dios. Chunch ju alatʼit ni milacataʼan ju xamamakʼalhkʼajni ju Dios ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan.
66018021	Pus ju acsnich pumatam anquilh ju na tachapun ixjunita chʼapalh lakatam chiux tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼai xvati. Chai tarr macaʼalh lacaʼalama. Naulh: ―Tachi ju anuʼ chiux ni lacatachaput ju makʼancalh chai taʼacnukʼalhi lacxcan pus chunch vachuʼ canavicanaʼ ju Babilonia ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan. Chai vachuʼ jantu tavanan lai catitasuchokolh.
66018022	Chai jantu tavanan catikʼasmatcalh ju anch ju isʼasanti arpa nin yuchi ju milhpat nin yuchi ju skʼolh. Vana jantu tavanan calhitajucalh anch ju ixnavini tijpachux lhichʼalhcat. Chai jantu catikʼasmatcalh ju anch ni calacsquiticalh.
66018023	Jantu tavanan catimapulhcu ju anch tuʼuʼ maclhcu. Nin yuchi ni cakʼasmatcalh ju anch ju ixchivintiʼan ju na talackʼachan ni va ancaʼ tamakʼaxtʼokʼa. Chunch cajunaʼ mas xalackʼajin ixtajunita ju saʼastʼanin ju anch lakʼachakʼan. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ alacpuʼokxchokʼolh laʼixʼalhicujnut.
66018024	Chai laʼixpulacni ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan amaknicancha ju ixtanajun ixchivinti Dios chai ju ixtalhilacaʼanta ju Jesús. Chai ju amachakʼan anch yuʼunch ju talhinaulh ixʼamaknicaʼan tachi chun ju ixlapanacni Dios ju ixtatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
66019001	Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus ickʼasmatlh lhu chivinti tachi ju na va lhu lapanacni ixtachivinin ju lactʼiyan. Ixtanajun: Calakʼayauch ju Dios. Yuchach ju xaquintamakʼalhtaxtuyan. Chai yuchach ju calakʼayacalh. Chai yuchach ju alin ixtachaput.
66019002	Yuchi calhiʼulhtucanaʼ chunch ni aktsʼiya muctaxtui ju ixchivinti chai sok navi acsni xtʼakʼa ju tuʼuʼ makʼalhkʼajnat. Pus xtaknilh ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnat ju kʼai alactuʼunu chakoʼulh ju lakʼalhita ju lacamunutpaʼ laʼixʼalactuʼunti. Chai ju quiDiosʼan vachuʼ amamapalhni ixʼacʼalhniʼan ju ixlapanacni.
66019003	Chai aktam tanonchokopa ju ixtalhavatʼan: ―Calakʼayau ju Dios ni jantu tavanan lakmixa ju xajin junta tʼajun lhcunuʼ ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan.
66019004	Pus ju ixpumapʼuxamtʼatʼiʼan papanin chai ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat tataʼaktsokotanilh chai talakʼayalh ju Dios ju vi lacakʼai ixputolan. Ixtajuni: ―Vachuʼ iclacasqʼuinau ni chunch ju caʼulhtucalh ju Dios. Vachuʼ calakʼayayau.
66019005	Chai vachuʼ ju lacakʼai putolan mincha lakatam chivinti junta naulh: Alakʼayatʼit ju quiDiosʼan tachi chun ju uxijnan ju ixlapanacni untʼatʼit. Chux ju uxijnan ju tʼalhoniyatʼit mas xalactʼicstʼin untʼatʼit chai vachuʼ ju uxijnan ju xalackʼajin untʼatʼit.
66019006	Pus ju acsnich ickʼasmatlh ju chivinti tachi ju na va lhu ixlacchivincanch. Chai ju iskʼasmatca chunch ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ atalhavana xcan. Tachi acsni na tʼasai ju tʼajin. Pus ju yuʼunch chani ixtanajun: Calakʼayau ni yuchi ju lhinajun. Yuchi ju quiʼucxtinʼan Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni.
66019007	Cakʼachanauch chai calakʼayauch ju yuchi ni chilh ju ixputamakʼaxtokni ju Askʼatʼa Borrego chai malakchʼininkʼotach ju isʼasqʼuininti.
66019008	Chai xtaknicalh ju yuchi ju kʼoxi pumpuʼ ju lino juncan. Chai ju yuchi na xlipnicʼa junita chai na snakʼankʼa. Pus ju anuʼ na kʼoxi pumpuʼ laktsipaxcavacan ju tuʼuʼ kʼox ju tanavita ju talhilacaʼanta ju Jesús.
66019009	Chai ju anquilh quijuni: ―Atsʼokʼulatʼich ju acjunan: “Ma na takʼachan ju caʼatʼasanicanach lacalacvaiti acsni catamakʼaxtʼokʼaʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego”. Vachuʼ chani quijuni: ―Ju ani chivinti slivasalh ni yuchi ju Dios ju chunch xanajun.
66019010	Pus ju acsnich ictaʼaktsokotanilh vanin laʼixchʼajaʼ ju anuʼ anquilh ni va xaclakʼayaputun. Para ju yuchi quijuni: ―Jantu chun aqʼuiʼulhtʼu ni va mintʼaxalapanac icjunita chai ixtʼaxalapanac ju miʼalakʼavin ju tajuni ju lapanacni ixlacata ju Jesús. Alai yuchi ju Dios ju alakʼayatʼi. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni ju anquilh. Pus ju ixlapanac Dios junita yuchi ju vas najun ju chivinti ixlacata ju Jesús.
66019011	Chai iclaktsʼilh ju tʼiyan ni ilhtekʼai chai ixya lakatam caballo ju na xnapapa. Chai ju ixpujucʼalh yuchi ju lai lhilaksican chai najun ju stavasalanti. Chai ju yuchi acsni lakʼoxi tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan chai acsni lasai pus sok ju navi.
66019012	Chai ju yuchi kʼai lam lam ixtalakpuyajui tachi ju tuʼuʼ xaʼalapnaʼ jipi. Chai na lhu ixʼalin ju ixcorona. Chai ju anuʼ tapakaʼut ju ixvilhnilh jantu xamatiʼ ixmachakxai. Va isʼakstu ixmachakxai.
66019013	Chai ixlakchʼita lakatam ixpumpuʼ ju lana istsʼamkʼota acʼalhni. Chai ju ixpujucʼalh ju caballo lhimapakaʼucanta ixchivinti Dios.
66019014	Chai tachi chun ju xataropajni lactʼiyan si lacxnapapa caballo ixtapuchʼakʼokʼata chai ixtalakchʼita lackʼoxi pumpuʼ ju lino juncan. Chai na xnapapa chai na salaka ixjunita.
66019015	Chai ju xaʼapʼulanaʼ ixquilhtaxtuta lakatam espada ju na quicxtui. Yuchi ju caʼaputʼalasayaʼ ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Chai ju tuchi canonaʼ ju yuchi pus yuchach ju cataquiclacaʼiyaʼ ju lapanacni. Pus yuchach ju caʼamamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju lapanacni laʼixtalhkʼamti ju Dios.
66019016	Chai laʼixpumpuʼ chai laʼixkʼatuʼ lacvilhnilh ixtapakaʼut. Chani najun: “Yuchi ju ani ju palai xakʼai tachi chun ju xalackʼajin. Chai yuchi ju palai xakʼai ucxtin tachi chun ju ucxtinin”.
66019017	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh pumatam anquilh ju ixya lacaʼavilhchan. Chai na pʼas axakʼala tachi chun ju tsʼokʼo. Ajuni: ―Atʼatʼit. Atʼakʼaixtʼoktʼit ni canaviyaʼ lakatam kʼai lacvaiti ju Dios.
66019018	Laich aʼuniyaʼitʼit ju ixʼacanitʼan ju xalackʼajin chai ju xaʼucxtinin taropajni chai ixʼacanitʼan ju lactachapunin lapanacni chai ixʼacanitʼan ju caballo chai ju ixtapujucʼanalh chai ixʼacanitʼan va tichi chavaich. Yuʼunch ju matiʼ ixʼucxtinʼan chai yuʼunch ju va xalapanacni tajunita. Yuʼunch ju salactʼicstʼin chai ju xalackʼajin.
66019019	Chai iclaktsʼilh ni ixtatakʼaixtokta ju maktiliʼ ju ixtacuttacha lacaʼalama chai ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ chai chux ju ixtaropajniʼan. Va catatʼalasayaʼ ju pujucʼalh ju xnapapa caballo chai ixtaropajni ju yuchi.
66019020	Pus tachʼinin tava ju maktiliʼ chai ju lapanac ju istasui tachi ixlapanac Dios mas jantu. Yuchi ju ixnavich ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju maktiliʼ chai ixʼalacpuʼokxchokʼota ju lapanacni ju ixʼalhimichicanta ixtapakaʼut ju maktiliʼ chai yuʼunch ju ixtalakʼayai ju ixlapalaxtuta tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Pus ju maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ aʼokxchokʼonu lapanac vaklhtam amacaʼancalh xalakʼajun junta maktajita jipi lacaʼazufre.
66019021	Chai ju aliʼin tapuni ju espada ju taxtui laʼixquilhni ju ixpujucʼalh ju xnapapa caballo. Pus tachi chun ju tsʼokʼo na talhilalh ju anuʼ acanit.
66020001	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh pumatam anquilh ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Chai ixchʼapata ju xallave junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Vachuʼ ixchʼapata ju makakʼai cadena.
66020002	Chai ju anuʼ anquilh chʼapalh ju kʼai lu ju na makʼanchich ixtʼajun. Yuchach ju lhacaticuru chai Satanás juncan. Chai chʼiʼula tam milh cʼata.
66020003	Chai lana tin macaʼalh junta makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Chai malakachinu. Chai lana mucʼalh ju ixpamichin ju kʼai ucxtin laxamalhtich junta malakachinu. Ju chunch ni jantuch lai xamatiʼ camaklhtekʼaniyaʼ ni lai cataxtulh ni caʼaʼokxchokʼochokolh ju lapanacni tus ni calaktsayanta tam milh cʼata. Acsni calaktsayach pus tasqʼuini ni camacajuncalh pantsʼiquis.
66020004	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju lackʼai putolan chai ixtapuvilanalh ju lapanacni ju axtaknicalh ixtachaputʼan ni laich catalakʼoxiyaʼ ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Chai iclaktsʼilh ixtacuvinʼan ju ixʼalacʼacchʼucʼupʼuxcanta va ixlacaʼatalh ni ixtanajun ni ixtalhilaksi ju Jesús chai ni ixtaʼajuni ju lapanacni ixchivinti Dios. Chai ju yuʼunch jantu ixtalakʼayata ju anuʼ maktiliʼ nin yuchi ju ixlapalaxtucanta ixlacatuna ju maktiliʼ nin yuchi ni caʼamuntiʼulacalh ixtapakaʼut ju maktiliʼ nin caʼulanicalh laʼixmacaʼan. Pus ju yuʼunch talokʼonchokolh laʼixʼanintiʼan chai tatʼataʼucxtini ju Cristo tam milh cʼata.
66020005	Yuʼunch ju pʼulhnan amalokʼonichokocalh laʼixʼanintiʼan. Para ju aliʼin aninin catalokʼonchokoyaʼ laʼixʼanintiʼan acsni caʼaclayaʼ tam milh cʼata.
66020006	Slivasalh na talackʼachan chai salaka tajunita ju makyuʼunch tajunita ju pʼulan amalokʼonichokocalh laʼixʼanintiʼan. Ju yuʼunch jantu catitani ju ixlhipaktʼui. Alai yuʼunch palijni catajunaʼ ju catalakʼayayaʼ ju Dios chai ju Cristo. Chai catatʼataʼucxtiniyach ju Cristo tam milh cʼata.
66020007	Chai acsni aclalhch ju tam milh cʼata pus ju Satanás maxtucalh laʼixpulachʼin.
66020008	Chai taxtulh. Alh aʼokxchokʼonuʼ ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Aʼokxchokʼomakʼaixtoklh ju Gog chai ju Magog ni catalasalh. Pus ju yuʼunch lana na ilhuʼan ixtajunita. Chunch ilhilhuʼan ixtajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ xacucu alama.
66020009	Chai laʼixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ tatakʼaixtoklh. Chai talakʼaxcʼavitnu talakachoko ju ixlapanacni Dios junta ixtatʼajun ju lakʼachakʼan ju na mapaini ju Dios. Para ju Dios macamilh ju jipi chai lana alacmaknikʼo ju anuʼ talakʼaxcʼavitnunun.
66020010	Chai ju lhacaticuru ju ixʼaʼokxchokʼota ju yuʼunch lana tin macaʼancalh junta na kʼai maktajita lacaʼazufre. Anch junta ixtatanumanalh ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ lapanac ju ixlhitalacasuich tachi ixlapanac Dios. Pus caʼamamakʼalhkʼajnikʼalhicanaʼ tontatsʼis chai tontacuj.
66020011	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lakatam kʼai putolan ju na xnapapa ixjunita. Vachuʼ iclaktsʼilh ju ixvi ju anch. Chai ju acsnich vachuʼ iclaktsʼilh ju lacatʼun chai ju lactʼiyan ni lana tatsʼankʼakʼo.
66020012	Chai iclaktsʼilh ju tanita ni ixtayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ kʼai putolan mas yuʼunch ju xalackʼajin chai ju salactʼicstʼin. Chai ju lackʼalhtankʼai alhiqui apuxkʼotcalh. Chai vachuʼ puxkʼotcalh alakatam alhiqui. Yuchach ju alhiqui junta atsʼokʼulanicanta ixtapakaʼutʼan tachi chun ju alin isʼatsucuntiʼan jonkʼalhita. Chai tachi chun ju ixtanita amucʼanicalh ixtalakʼalhinʼan ixlacata ju taxtokni ju tsʼokcanta lacaʼalhiqui ni anchach istsʼokʼulakʼocanta tuchi tanavita ju kʼantam kʼantam.
66020013	Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju ixtanitajumanalh lacaʼalama talokʼonchokolh. Chai vachuʼ tachi chun ju aliʼin ju ixtanita. Chai ixchuxʼan amucʼanicalh ju ixtalakʼalhinʼan ixlacata tuchi navitach ju pumatamin. Chai tachi chun ju ani amacaʼancalh ju lacajipi.
66020014	Chai ju acsni jantu tavanan catini xamatiʼ. Para junta catamakʼalhkʼajnankʼalhiyaʼ yuchach ju ixlhipaktʼui aninti juncan.
66020015	Chai vachuʼ amacaʼancalh lacajipi tachi chun ju jantu alhitajunicalh ixtapakaʼutʼan lacaʼalhiqui junta tsʼokʼulanicanta ixtapakaʼutʼan ju alin isʼatsucuntiʼan jonkʼalhita.
66021001	Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lakatam sastʼi tʼiyan chai lakatam sastʼi lacatʼun. Pus ju pʼulhnan tʼiyan chai ju pʼulhnan lacatʼun tatsʼankʼakʼolh chai matich ixjunita ju alama.
66021002	Pus ju quitʼin icXivan chai quitʼin ju iclaktsʼilh ju ixlakʼachakʼan Dios ni minchalh lactʼiyan. Dios ju macamilh. Chai yuchach ju sastʼi Jerusalén junita. Slivasalh na cʼus istasui. Chun tachi ju tam atsiʼ ju na cʼus malakchʼinin ixlacata ixlhitʼataviti.
66021003	Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju taxtucha ju lactʼiyan. Na pʼas ju chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai chani naulh: ―Ju chavai ju Dios catsucuyaʼ junta tatʼajun ju lapanacni. Ju Dios anch ju camaktsucuyaʼ. Chai ju yuʼunch ixlapanacni catajunaʼ. Chai isʼakstu ju Dios caʼalactʼatolhkʼalhiyach chai isDiosʼan cajunaʼ.
66021004	Chai matich cajunaʼ ju kʼalhut. Chai jantu xamatiʼ caniyaʼ. Chai jantu xamatiʼ caʼamakʼanininaʼ nin yuchi ni lai cakʼalhulh nin yuchi ni lai jintaʼ caxcanilh. Jantu catiʼalilh tuʼuʼ ju chunch ni tapasakʼota ju xapʼulhnan taxtokni.
66021005	Chai ju yuchi ju ixvi laʼixputolan ju xakʼai ucxtin chani naulh: ―Quitʼin ju iclasastʼikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Vachuʼ chani ju quijunilh: ―Atsʼokʼulatʼich tachi chun ju ani taxtokni ni lai lhilaksican ju ani chivinti chai stavasalanti junita.
66021006	Chai vachuʼ chani ju quijunilh: ―Icnavikʼolhch tachi chun ju taxtokni. Ju quitʼin xactʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai actsucukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch. Pus ni xamatiʼ na quicxixa pus acxtakniyaʼ ju xcan ju va aclhikʼailaktsʼinaʼ. Anchach acʼiyaʼ junta taxtui ju xcan ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti jonkʼalhita. Laich cakʼotʼaʼ chai jantu catimapalalh tuʼuʼ.
66021007	Chai ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai sich ixʼanuʼ cajunaʼ tachi chun ju taxtokni. Chai ju quitʼin isDios acjunaʼ. Chai ju yuchi quintsʼalh cajunaʼ.
66021008	Para tachi chun ju va tatalhanan chai ixlhiyuchi jantu tachʼakʼokʼakʼalhiputun ju Jesús chai yuʼunch ju jantu talhilaksita ju Jesús chai yuʼunch ju na alactuʼunun chai ju amakninin chai ju tatʼatʼajun va tichi chavaich chai ju alhicujnin chai ju va tamaklacaʼani ju tuʼuʼ santo chai tachi chun ju tanajun taʼaklhtamat chivinti sich camacaʼancanaʼ lacajipi junta na maktajita lacaʼazufre. Yuchach ju ixlhipaktʼui aninti. ―Ma chunchach ju quijuni ju Dios ni actsʼokʼula.
66021009	Pus ju acsnich quilakmilh pumatam sia yuʼunch ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata ju lakatamin ixpumapʼunʼan ju isʼaktsamanta lakatamin makʼalhkʼajnat ju va yuchach cajunaʼ. Chai ju anuʼ anquilh chani quijuni: ―Asokʼoch chai acmasuniyan ju isʼasqʼuininti ju ixʼamachakaʼ cajunaʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
66021010	Pus ju Spiritu Santu quimapaxanilh ju quiʼalacʼavanti chai ju anuʼ anquilh quilhiʼalh junta vi ju kʼai talhpa junta na putankʼai ixjunita. Chai ju anch quimasunilh ju kʼai ixlakʼachakʼan Dios ju Jerusalén juncan. Ixtʼonachilh takʼalhtajuchiniʼ ju ani lacatʼun. Minchalh ju lactʼiyan junta vilhcha ju Dios.
66021011	Chai ju anch lakʼachakʼan kʼai xlapʼapʼa ixmaktaji ni vachuʼ anch ju ixtʼajun ju Dios. Ixmaktaji tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼoxi chiux ju slivasalh laklhu ixtapalh. Chun tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju jaspe juncan. Chai na stalankʼa ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ vaso.
